expression:
create function D_ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN_DRVTVS(FV, TYP_HDG, IS_LCM) {
returns 
if (CNSTNT_ACCNTNG_FRMWRK in ("2", "3") and TYP_HDG in ("1", "2", "3", "4", "5", "6")) then
if (IS_LCM = "T") then "841"
else "842"
elseif  (CNSTNT_ACCNTNG_FRMWRK in ("1") and TYP_HDG in ("1", "2", "3", "4", "5", "6")) then "84"
elseif (FV >= 0) then
if (CNSTNT_ACCNTNG_FRMWRK in ("2", "3")) then "2"
elseif (CNSTNT_ACCNTNG_FRMWRK in ("1")) then "3"
else "0"
elseif (FV < 0) then 
(if (CNSTNT_ACCNTNG_FRMWRK in ("2", "3")) then "23"
elseif (CNSTNT_ACCNTNG_FRMWRK in ("1")) then "33"
else "0")
else "0"
as string
}

create function D_ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN_SBJCT_IMPRMNT(ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN, IMPRMNT_STTS) {
returns 
if (ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN in ("9") and IMPRMNT_STTS in ("0")) then "82"
elseif (ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN in ("9") and IMPRMNT_STTS in ("21", "26")) then "81"
else ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN
as string
}

/*Apply the derivation for the Carrying amount (CRRYNG_AMNT) to the Loans and advances - enriched (LNS_ADVNCS_E)*/D_CRRYNG_AMNT_LNS_ADVNCS := LNS_ADVNCS_E [calc D_CRRYNG_AMNT(ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN, FV, GRSS_CRRYNG_AMNT_E_INTRST, ACCRD_INTRST, FV_CHNG_HDG_ACCNTNG,  ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT, CRRYNG_AMNT, CNSTNT_IS_CRRYNG_AMNT_DRVD) as "CRRYNG_AMNT" role Measure];
/*Keep only relevant variables*/D_CRRYNG_AMNT_LNS_ADVNCS := D_CRRYNG_AMNT_LNS_ADVNCS [keep(INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID, DT_RFRNC, PRSPCTV_ID, CRRYNG_AMNT)];

/*Apply the derivation for the Carrying amount (CRRYNG_AMNT) to the Owned securities - enriched (OWND_SCRTS_E)*/D_CRRYNG_AMNT_SCRTS := OWND_SCRTS_E [calc D_CRRYNG_AMNT(ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN, FV, GRSS_CRRYNG_AMNT_E_INTRST, ACCRD_INTRST, FV_CHNG_HDG_ACCNTNG,  ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT, CRRYNG_AMNT, CNSTNT_IS_CRRYNG_AMNT_DRVD) as "CRRYNG_AMNT" role Measure];
/*Keep only relevant variables*/D_CRRYNG_AMNT_SCRTS := D_CRRYNG_AMNT_SCRTS [keep(OWND_SCRTY_ID, DT_RFRNC, PRSPCTV_ID, CRRYNG_AMNT)];

/* CNTRPRTS_ATNMS contains the counterparties that are autonomous or not an enterprise, and for which the enterprise size is calculated */CNTRPRTS_ATNMS := CNTRPRTS [filter (ENTRPRS_SZ_CHC = "0" and TYP_ENTRPRS in ("1", "2"))];

/* CNTRPRTS_ATNMS contains the counterparties that are autonomous or not an enterprise, and for which the enterprise size is calculated */CNTRPRTS_ATNMS := CNTRPRTS [keep (CNTRPRTY_ID, NMBR_EMPLYS, BLNC_SHT_TTL, ANNL_TRNVR, TYP_ENTRPRS, CNTRL_PBLC_BDS, EXCPTN_MRG_ACQSTN)];
ALL := [inner PRLMNRY_STTNG as "A", CNTRPRTS_PRVS as "B" on A.CNTRPRTY_ID = B.CNTRPRTY_ID] {keep (A.CNTRPRTY_ID, A.ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY_T, B.ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD, B.ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY)};
ALL := [inner ALL as "A", CNTRPRTS as "C" on A.CNTRPRTY_ID = C.CNTRPRTY_ID] {keep (A.ALL_VARIABLES, C.TYP_ENTRPRS, C.CNTRL_PBLC_BDS, C.EXCPTN_MRG_ACQSTN as "MRGACQ")};

/* The final setting takes into account: Whether: (i) The enterprise is not an enterprise (TYP_ENTERPRS=1); (ii) it is controlled by public bodies; (iii) There were no input data (ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY_T = 7);  (iv) there was no information regarding previous periods; (v) the mergers and acquisitions exception applies; and (vi) in any other case, the interaction between the result of the calculation for the current period plus the results for previous period applies  */FNL_STTNG := ALL [calc (if TYP_ENTRPRS = "1" then "9" 
elseif CNTRL_PBLC_BDS = "1" then "6" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY_T = "7" then "7" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD = null then ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY_T 
elseif MRGACQ = 1 then ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY_T 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY_T = "4" then (if ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD = "4" then "4" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD in ("6", "2", "3", "7") and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY = "4" then "4" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD = "3" and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY in ("6", "2", "3", "7") then "3" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD = "2" and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY = "3" then "3" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD = "2" and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY in ("6", "2", "7") then "2" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD in ("6", "7") and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY = "3" then "3" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD in ("6", "7") and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY = "2" then "2" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD in ("6", "7") and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY in ("6", "7") then "6" 
else null) 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY_T = "3" then (if ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD = "3" then "3" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD in ("6", "2", "4", "7") and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY = "3" then "3" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD = "4" and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY = "4" then "4" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD = "4" and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY in ("6", "2", "7") then "3" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD = "2" and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY = "4" then "3" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD = "2" and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY in ("6", "2", "7") then "2" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD in ("6", "7") and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY = "4" then "3" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD in ("6", "7") and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY = "2" then "2" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD in ("6", "7") and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY in ("6", "7") then "6" 
else null) 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY_T = "2" then (if ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD = "2" then "2" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD in ("6", "3", "4", "7") and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY = "2" then "2" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD = "4" and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY = "4" then "4" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD = "4" and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY = "3" then "3" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD = "4" and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY in ("6", "7") then "2" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD = "3" and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY = "4" then "3" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD = "3" and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY in (6, 7) then "2" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD = "3" and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY = "3" then "3" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD in ("6", "7") and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY in ("3", "4") then "2" 
else (if ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD in ("6", "7") and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY in ("6", "7") then "6" 
else null)) 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY_T = 6 then (if ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD in ("6", "7") then "6" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD in ("2", "3", "4") and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY in ("6", "7") then "6" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD = "2" and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY in ("2", "3", "4") then "2" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD = "3" and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY = "2" then "2" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD = "3" and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY in ("3", "4") then "3" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD = "4" and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY = "2" then "2" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD = "4" and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY = "3" then "3" 
elseif ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD = "4" and ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY = "4" then "4" 
else null) 
else null) as "ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD_T"];
FNL_STTNG := FNL_STTNG [keep (CNTRPRTY_ID, ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD_T as "ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD")];
FNL_STTNG := FNL_STTNG [calc "T" as "IS_DRVD_ENTRPRS_SZ" role Measure];

/* CNTRPRTS_INPT contains the counterparties for which the enterprise size is provided as input already with the structure that can be united with the calculations (Counterparty identifier, Enterprise size calculated, Enterprise size choice) */CNTRPRTS_INPT := CNTRPRTS [filter (ENTRPRS_SZ_CHC = "1")];

/* CNTRPRTS_INPT contains the counterparties for which the enterprise size is provided as input already with the structure that can be united with the calculations (Counterparty identifier, Enterprise size calculated, Enterprise size choice) */CNTRPRTS_INPT := CNTRPRTS_INPT [keep (CNTRPRTY_ID, ENTRPRS_SZ as "ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD")];

/* CNTRPRTS_INPT contains the counterparties for which the enterprise size is provided as input already with the structure that can be united with the calculations (Counterparty identifier, Enterprise size calculated, Enterprise size choice) */CNTRPRTS_INPT := CNTRPRTS_INPT [calc "F" as "IS_DRVD_ENTRPRS_SZ" role Measure];
D_ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD1 := union (FNL_STTNG, CNTRPRTS_INPT);

/* CNTRPRTS_PRVS contains the calculated values in the previous period. For those counterparties for which there was no value in the previous period, a null value is assigned */CNTRPRTS_PRVS := [left CNTRPRTS as "A", ENTRPRS_SZ_PRVS_PRD as "B" on A.CNTRPRTY_ID = B.CNTRPRTY_ID] {keep (A.CNTRPRTY_ID, B.ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD, B.ENTRPRS_SZ_PRLMNRY)};
D_ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD1 := D_ENTRPRS_SZ_CLCLTD1 [keep (CNTRPRTY_ID, ENTRPRS_SZ, IS_DRVD_ENTRPRS_SZ)];

/* In order to aggregate the partner enterprises, the relevant figures have to be multiplied by the percentage of interest in the capital or voting rights */PRTNR_ENTRPRSS_AGG := PRTNR_ENTRPRSS [calc PRCNTG_INTRST_CPTL_VTNG_RGHTS * BLNC_SHT_TTL as "AGGRGBL_BLNC_SHT_TTL" role Measure];

/* For group enterprises, the relevant figures are taken from the group data */GRP_ENTRPRSS_AGG := [inner GRP_DT as "A", GRP_CNTRPRTY_RLTNSHP as "B" on A.GRP_INTRNL_ID = B.GRP_INTRNL_ID] {keep (B.CNTRPRTY_ID, A.NMBR_EMPLYS as "AGGRGBL_NMBR_EMPLYS", A.BLNC_SHT_TTL as "AGGRGBL_BLNC_SHT_TTL", A.ANNL_TRNVR as "AGGRGBL_ANNL_TRNVR")};

/* The relevant figures for all counterparties have to be aggregated in order to have one single value for each counterparty */TTL_AGG1 := PRTNR_ENTRPRSS_AGG [keep (CNTRPRTY_ID, AGGRGBL_BLNC_SHT_TTL, AGGRGBL_NMBR_EMPLYS, AGGRGBL_ANNL_TRNVR)];

/* The relevant figures for all counterparties have to be aggregated in order to have one single value for each counterparty */TTL_AGG2 := LNKD_ENTRPRSS [keep (CNTRPRTY_ID, NMBR_EMPLYS as "AGGRGBL_NMBR_EMPLYS", BLNC_SHT_TTL as "AGGRGBL_BLNC_SHT_TTL", ANNL_TRNVR as "AGGRGBL_ANNL_TRNVR")];

/* The relevant figures for all counterparties have to be aggregated in order to have one single value for each counterparty */TTL_AGG3 := GRP_ENTRPRSS_AGG [keep (CNTRPRTY_ID, AGGRGBL_BLNC_SHT_TTL, AGGRGBL_NMBR_EMPLYS, AGGRGBL_ANNL_TRNVR)]

/* The relevant figures for all counterparties have to be aggregated in order to have one single value for each counterparty */TTL_AGG4 := CNTRPRTS_ATNMS [keep (CNTRPRTY_ID, BLNC_SHT_TTL as "AGGRGBL_BLNC_SHT_TTL", NMBR_EMPLYS as "AGGRGBL_NMBR_EMPLYS", ANNL_TRNVR as "AGGRGBL_ANNL_TRNVR")];
/* The relevant figures for all counterparties have to be aggregated in order to have one single value for each counterparty */TTL_AGG := TTL_AGG1 + TTL_AGG2 + TTL_AGG3 + TTL_AGG4;
/*extract subset of the cube Owned securities - enriched (OWND_SCRTY_E) containing the "group perspective"*/OWND_SCRTY_SUB := OWND_SCRTS_E [filter (PRSPCTV_ID = CNSTNT_PRSPCTV_GRP_ID)]

/*enrich the cube Counterparties - enriched (CNTRPRTS_E) with information on Countries reference information - Enriched (CNTRY_E)*/CNTRPRTS_ENHNCD := [left CNTRPRTS_E as "A", CNTRY as "B" on A.CNTRY = B.CNTRY] {keep (A.ALL_VARIABLES, B.CRRNCY as "CRRNCY_CNTRY", B.EXTRNL_CRDT_ASSSSMNT as "EXTRNL_CRDT_ASSSSMNT_CNTRY", B.IS_MMBR_STT as "IS_MMBR_STT_CNTRY", B.CRDT_QLTY_STP as "CRDT_QLTY_STP_CNTRY", B.ECAI_ECA as "ECAI_ECA_CNTRY", B.IS_SHRT_TRM_CRDT_ASSSSMNT as "IS_SHRT_TRM_CRDT_ASSSSMNT_CNTRY")}

/*add new variable Is exposure class applicable*/D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP := D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP [calc (D_IS_EXPSR_CLSS_APPLCBL1 (APPRCH_PRDNTL_PRPSS, EXPSR_CLSS, PRDNTL_PRTFL, CNSTNT_DRGTN_SMLL_TRDNG_BK_BSNSS, IS_SHRT_PSTN, INTRA_GROUP_PRUD_SCOPE, RLTNSHP_SCRTSTN_CRDT_TRNSFR, TRTMNT_TRNSFRRD_ASSTS_BLNC_SHT, SGNFCNT_RSK_TRNSFR, TRTMNT_TRNSFRRD_ASSTS_BLNC_SHT_ORGNL, SGNFCNT_RSK_TRNSFR_ORGNL)) as "IS_EXPSR_CLSS_APPLCBL"]

/*add variables from the cube Counterparties - Enriched (CNTRPRTS_E) related to the issuer*/D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP := [left D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP as "A", CNTRPRTS_E as "B" on A.ISSR_ID = B.CNTRPRTY_ID] {keep (A.ALL_VARIABLES, B.INSTTTNL_SCTR, B.CRDT_QLTY_STTS, B.INTRNTNL_ORGNSTN, B.LEI)}

/*add new variable Exposure class*/D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP := D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP [calc (D_ASSGN_EXPSR_CLSS1 (IS_EXPSR_CLSS_APPLCBL, EXPSR_CLSS, RLTNSHP_SCRTSTN_CRDT_TRNSFR, TYP_RSK_TRNSFR, TYP_RSK_TRNSFR_ORGNL, IS_EQTY_250_RSK_WGHT, INSTTTNL_SCTR, CHRCTRSTCS_CRDT_RSK, IS_PRTCLR_HGH_RSK, TYP_INSTRMNT, SCRTY_RNK_LVL, CRDT_QLTY_STTS, INTRNTNL_ORGNSTN, LEI, IS_CVRD_BND, IS_SHRT_TRM_CRDT_ASSSSMNT)) as "EXPSR_CLSS_CLCLTD"]

/*add information about the issuer*/D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP := [left D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP as "A", CNTRPRTS_ENHNCD as "B" on A.ISSR_ID = B.CNTRPRTY_ID] {keep (A.ALL_VARIABLES, B.EXTRNL_CRDT_ASSSSMNT as "EXTRNL_CRDT_ASSSSMNT_ISSR", B.CRDT_QLTY_STP as "CRDT_QLTY_STP_ISSR", B.IS_SHRT_TRM_CRDT_ASSSSMNT as "IS_SHRT_TRM_CRDT_ASSSSMNT_ISSR", B.CNTRY_CRRNCY as "CRRNCY_ISSR", B.CRDT_QLTY_STP_CNTRY, B.EXTRNL_CRDT_ASSSSMNT_CNTRY, B.ECAI_ECA_CNTRY, B.IS_MMBR_STT_CNTRY)}

/*add information about the owner*/D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP := [left D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP as "A", CNTRPRTS_ENHNCD as "B" on A.OWNR_INTRNL_ID = B.CNTRPRTY_ID] {keep (A.ALL_VARIABLES, B.CRRNCY_CNTRY as "CRRNCY_OWNR", B.IS_MMBR_STT_CNTRY as "IS_MMBR_STT_OWNR")}

/*assign the variable Credit quality step in BIRD process which will then be used in order to calculate the Risk weight*/D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP := D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP [calc (D_ASSGN_CRDT_QLTY_STP_BIRD (ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT, CNTRY_CRRNCY, CRDT_QLTY_STP_ISSR, CRDT_QLTY_STP_CNTRY, CRRNCY_CNTRY, CRRNCY_DNMNTN, CRRNCY_ISSR, CRRNCY_OWNR, DT_ISS, DT_MTRTY, DT_RFRNC, ECAI_ECA_ISSR, ECAI_ECA_CNTRY, EXPSR_CLSS, EXPSR_VL, EXTRNL_CRDT_ASSSSMNT_ISSR, EXTRNL_CRDT_ASSSSMNT_CNTRY, IMPRMNT_STTS, INTRNTNL_ORGNSTN, IS_CNTRL_GVRNMNT_TRTD_LG, IS_CNTRL_GVRNMNT_TRTD_PS, IS_EQTY_250_RSK_WGHT, IS_EQTY_HLD_370_RSK_WGHT, IS_LCL_GVRNMNT_TRTD_PS, IS_MMBR_STT, IS_MMBR_STT_OWNR, IS_QLFY_HLD_1250_RSK_WGHT, IS_RSCRTSTN, IS_RSCRTSTN_ORGNL, IS_SHRT_TRM_CRDT_ASSSSMNT_ISSR, IS_SM_PRTCTN_SCHM, RLTNSHP_SCRTSTN_CRDT_TRNSFR, SPCFC_RSK_WGHT)) as "CRDT_QLTY_STP_BIRD"]
D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP := D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP [calc (D_CLCLT_RSK_WGHT (EXPSR_CLSS_CLCLTD, CRDT_QLTY_STP_BIRD)) as "RSK_WGHT_CLCLTD"]

/*in case the exposure class should be derived the calculated exposure class will be provided in the resulting dataset*/D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP := D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP [calc (if CNSTNT_IS_EXPSR_CLSS_DRVD = "T" then EXPSR_CLSS_CLCLTD else EXPSR_CLSS) as "EXPSR_CLSS_OTPT"]

/*in case the exposure class should be derived the calculated risk weight will be provided in the resulting dataset*/D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP := D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP [calc (if CNSTNT_IS_EXPSR_CLSS_DRVD = "T" then RSK_WGHT_CLCLTD else RSK_WGHT) as "RSK_WGHT_OTPT"]
/*extract a set of identifiers plus the Risk weight*/D_RSK_WGHT := D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP [keep (OWND_SCRTY_ID, RSK_WGHT_OTPT as "RSK_WGHT")]

/*add variables from the Registry table of securities - Enriched (RGSTRY_TBL_SCRTS_E)*/D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP := [left OWND_SCRTY_SUB as "A", RGSTRY_TBL_SCRTS as "B" on A.SCRTY_ID = B.SCRTY_ID] {keep (A.OWND_SCRTY_ID, A.ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN, A.APPRCH_PRDNTL_PRPSS, A.EXPSR_CLSS, A.IMPRMNT_STTS, A.OWNR_INTRNL_ID, A.PRDNTL_PRTFL, A.SCRTY_ID, A.SRC_ENCMBRNC, A.ACCMLTD_CHNGS_FV_CR, A.ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT, A.ACCRD_INTRST, A.ARRRS, A.CMLTV_RCVRS_SNC_DFLT, A.CRRYNG_AMNT, A.DT_FRBRNC_STTS, A.DT_PST_D, A.EXPSR_VL, A.FRBRNC_STTS, A.FV_CHNG_HDG_ACCNTNG, A.GRSS_CRRYNG_AMNT_E_INTRST, A.IMPRMNT_ASSSSMNT_MTHD, A.IS_EQTY_250_RSK_WGHT, A.IS_EQTY_HLD_370_RSK_WGHT, A.IS_QLFY_HLD_1250_RSK_WGHT, A.IS_SHRT_PSTN, A.LGD_DWNTRNS, A.LGD_NRML, A.MRKT_VL, A.NMNL_VL, A.ORGNL_SCRTSTN_ID, A.PRSPCTV, A.RLTNSHP_SCRTSTN_CRDT_TRNSFR, A.RSK_WGHT, A.SCRTSTN_TRNSFR_ID, A.SPCFC_RSK_WGHT, B.CLLTRL_LCTN, B.CRDT_QLTY_STP, B.CRRNCY_DNMNTN, B.DT_ISS, B.DT_MTRTY, B.DT_SCRTY_STTS, B.ECAI_ECA, B.EXTRNL_CRDT_ASSSSMNT, B.GRNTR_ID, B.IS_CVRD_BND, B.IS_LSTD, B.IS_PRTCLR_HGH_RSK, B.IS_SHRT_TRM_CRDT_ASSSSMNT, B.ISIN, B.ISSR_ID, B.PRMRY_ASST_CLSSFCTN, B.SCRTY_GRNT_LVL, B.SCRTY_LVL, B.SCRTY_RNK_LVL, B.SCRTY_STTS, B.TYP_ASST_SCRTSTN, B.TYP_INSTRMNT, B.UNT_MSR_NV)}
/*extract a set of identifiers plus the exposure class*/D_EXPSR_CLSS := D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP [keep (OWND_SCRTY_ID, EXPSR_CLSS_OTPT as "EXPSR_CLSS")]
/*extract a subset of the cube Group (GRP)*/GRP_SUB := GRP [keep (LGL_ENTTY_ID, CNSLDTN_SCP)];
/*add a default variable to the dataset GRP_SUB*/GRP_SUB := GRP_SUB [calc "T" as "CNNCTD"]

/*join the datasets D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP and GRP_SUB in order to identify intra group securities*/D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP := [left D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP as "A", GRP_SUB as "B" on A.ISSR_ID = B.LGL_ENTTY_ID] {keep (A.ALL_VARIABLES, B.CNNCTD)}
/*identify intra group securities by evaluating the variable Connected (CNNCTD)*/D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP := D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP [calc (if not isnull (CNNCTD) then "T" else "F") as "IS_INTRGRP_SCRTY"];
/*add information about intra group securities*/D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP := D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP [calc (G_INTRA_GROUP_PRUD_SCOPE (IS_INTRGRP_SCRTY, CNSLDTN_SCP)) as "INTRA_GROUP_PRUD_SCOPE"]

/*add Treatment of securitised/transferred assets in balance sheet and Significant risk transfer*/D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP := [left D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP as "A", SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_E as "B" on A.SCRTSTN_TRNSFR_ID = B.SCRTSTN_TRNSFR_ID] {keep (A.ALL_VARIABLES, B.TRTMNT_TRNSFRRD_ASSTS_BLNC_SHT, B.SGNFCNT_RSK_TRNSFR, B.TYP_RSK_TRNSFR)}

/*add Treatment of securitised/transferred assets in balance sheet and Significant risk transfer of an original securitisation (if applicable)*/D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP := [left D_EXPSR_CLSS_TMP as "A", SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_E as "B" on A.ORGNL_SCRTSTN_ID = B.SCRTSTN_TRNSFR_ID] {keep (A.ALL_VARIABLES, B.TRTMNT_TRNSFRRD_ASSTS_BLNC_SHT as "TRTMNT_TRNSFRRD_ASSTS_BLNC_SHT_ORGNL", B.SGNFCNT_RSK_TRNSFR as "SGNFCNT_RSK_TRNSFR_ORGNL", B.TYP_RSK_TRNSFR as "TYP_RSK_TRNSFR_ORGNL")}

create function D_GRSS_CRRYNG_AMNT(ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN, CRRYNG_AMNT, ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT, ACCMLTD_CHNGS_FV_CR, CRDT_QLTY_STTS, IMPRMNT_STTS, ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT_GAAP1, ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT_GAAP2) {
returns 
if (ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN in ("8", "6")) then (CRRYNG_AMNT + ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT)
elseif (ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN in ("41", "4") and CRDT_QLTY_STTS in ("18", "19", "2", "20")) then (if (ACCMLTD_CHNGS_FV_CR < 0) then CRRYNG_AMNT + ACCMLTD_CHNGS_FV_CR else CRRYNG_AMNT)
elseif (ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN in ("41", "4") and CRDT_QLTY_STTS = "11") then CRRYNG_AMNT
elseif (ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN = "14" and ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT > 0) then (CRRYNG_AMNT + ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT)
elseif (ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN = "14" and CRDT_QLTY_STTS in ("18", "19", "2", "20") and ACCMLTD_CHNGS_FV_CR <> 0) then (CRRYNG_AMNT + ACCMLTD_CHNGS_FV_CR)
elseif (ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN = "14" and CRDT_QLTY_STTS = "11" and (ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT = 0 or isnull(ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT))) then CRRYNG_AMNT
elseif (ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN = "7" and CRDT_QLTY_STTS in ("18", "19", "2", "20")) then (if (ACCMLTD_CHNGS_FV_CR < 0) then CRRYNG_AMNT + ACCMLTD_CHNGS_FV_CR else CRRYNG_AMNT)
elseif (ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN = "7" and CRDT_QLTY_STTS = "11") then CRRYNG_AMNT
elseif (((ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN = "9" and IMPRMNT_STTS = "0") or ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN = "82") and CRDT_QLTY_STTS in ("18", "19", "2", "20")) then (if (ACCMLTD_CHNGS_FV_CR < 0) then CRRYNG_AMNT + ACCMLTD_CHNGS_FV_CR else CRRYNG_AMNT)
elseif (((ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN = "9" and IMPRMNT_STTS = "0") or ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN = "82") and CRDT_QLTY_STTS = "11") then CRRYNG_AMNT
elseif ((ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN = "9" and IMPRMNT_STTS = "26") or (ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN = "81" and IMPRMNT_STTS = "26")) then (CRRYNG_AMNT + ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT_GAAP1)
elseif ((ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN = "9" and IMPRMNT_STTS = "21") or (ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN = "81" and IMPRMNT_STTS = "21")) then (CRRYNG_AMNT + ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT_GAAP1 + ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT_GAAP2)
elseif (ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN in ("73","74","76", "77")) then (CRRYNG_AMNT + ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT_GAAP1 + ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT_GAAP2)
else null
as integer
}

create function D_RPYMNT_RGHTS(TYP_INSTRMNT, IS_RDMBL_NTC) {
returns 
if TYP_INSTRMNT in ("260") then "1"
elseif TYP_INSTRMNT in ("300") then "0"
elseif (TYP_INSTRMNT in ("549") and IS_RDMBL_NTC = "T") then "4"
else "3"
as string
}

create function D_TM_PST_DU(DT_PST_D) {
returns
if (D_NMBR_DYS(DT_PST_D, CNSTNT_DT_RFRNC) >= 0 and D_NMBR_DYS(DT_PST_D, CNSTNT_DT_RFRNC) < 1) then "a"
elseif (D_NMBR_DYS(DT_PST_D, CNSTNT_DT_RFRNC) = 1) then "b"
elseif (D_NMBR_DYS(DT_PST_D, CNSTNT_DT_RFRNC) > 1 and D_NMBR_DYS(DT_PST_D, CNSTNT_DT_RFRNC) <= 30) then "c"
elseif (D_NMBR_DYS(DT_PST_D, CNSTNT_DT_RFRNC) > 30 and D_NMBR_DYS(DT_PST_D, CNSTNT_DT_RFRNC) <= 90) then "d"
elseif (D_NMBR_DYS(DT_PST_D, CNSTNT_DT_RFRNC) > 90 and D_NMBR_DYS(DT_PST_D, CNSTNT_DT_RFRNC) <= 180) then "e"
elseif (D_NMBR_DYS(DT_PST_D, CNSTNT_DT_RFRNC) > 180 and D_NMBR_DYS(DT_PST_D, CNSTNT_DT_RFRNC) <= 360) then "f"
elseif (D_NMBR_DYS(DT_PST_D, CNSTNT_DT_RFRNC) > 360 and D_NMBR_DYS(DT_PST_D, CNSTNT_DT_RFRNC) <= 1800) then "g"
elseif (D_NMBR_DYS(DT_PST_D, CNSTNT_DT_RFRNC) > 1800) then "h"
else "43"
as string
}

create function D_TYP_CLLTRL_GRNT_RCVD1(TYP_PRTCTN, ISSR_ID) {
returns 
if (CNSTNL_SL_CNLDT = "T" and TYP_PRTCTN in ("12") and ISSR_ID in (CONST_GRP)) then "1161"

elseif (TYP_PRTCTN in ("8")) then "8"
elseif (TYP_PRTCTN in ("9", "10")) then "10"
elseif (TYP_PRTCTN in ("5", "41")) then "960"
else "20"
as string
}

create function D_TYP_CLLTRL_GRNT_RCVD2(TYP_PRTCTN, IS_CMMRCL_CLLTRL_FNNCL_GRNT, IS_RSTNTL_CLLTRL_FNNCL_GRNT) {
returns

}

}

ANCRDT_ACCNTNG_C := [inner ANCRDT_ACCNTNG_C as "A", SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_E as "B" on A.SCRTSTN_TRNSFR_ID = B.SCRTSTN_TRNSFR_ID] {keep (A.ALL_VARIABLES, B.TRTMNT_TRNSFRRD_ASSTS_BLNC_SHT)};

/* derive / generate the variable Balance sheet recognition using the function G_RCGNTN_STTS1 */
ANCRDT_ACCNTNG_C := ANCRDT_ACCNTNG_C [calc (G_RCGNTN_STTS1 (TYP_INSTRMNT, FDCRY, ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN, OTSTNDNG_NMNL_AMNT, ACCMLTD_WRTFFS, RLTNSHP_SCRTSTN_CRDT_TRNSFR, TRTMNT_TRNSFRRD_ASSTS_BLNC_SHT, IS_CMPNNT_LGL_ENTTY)) as "RCGNTN_STTS"];

/* reduce the dataset to the structure of the cube Accounting (ANCRDT_ACCNTNG_C) */
ANCRDT_ACCNTNG_C := ANCRDT_ACCNTNG_C [keep (ACCMLTD_CHNGS_FV_CR, ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT, ACCMLTD_WRTFFS, ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN, CMLTV_RCVRS_SNC_DFLT, CNTRCT_ID role Identifier, CRRYNG_AMNT, DT_FRBRNC_STTS, PRFRMNG_STTS, DT_PRFRMNG_STTS, DT_RFRNC role Identifier, FRBRNC_STTS, IMPRMNT_ASSSSMNT_MTHD, IMPRMNT_STTS, INSTRMNT_ID role Identifier, OBSRVD_AGNT_ID role Identifier, PRDNTL_PRTFL, PRVSNS_OFF_BLNC_SHT, RCGNTN_STTS, SRC_ENCMBRNC)];
ANCRDT_ENTTY_DFLT_C := CNTRPRTS_E;

/*add the variable Is intragroup security with default value "False (F)"*/
ANCRDT_ENTTY_DFLT_C := ANCRDT_ENTTY_DFLT_C [calc "F" as "IS_INTRGRP_SCRTY"];

/*add the variable Is short position with default value "False (F)"*/
ANCRDT_ENTTY_DFLT_C := ANCRDT_ENTTY_DFLT_C [calc "F" as "IS_SHRT_PSTN"];
ANCRDT_ENTTY_DFLT_C := ANCRDT_ENTTY_DFLT_C [calc (G_DFLT_STTS_CNTRPRTY1 (APPRCH_CRDT_QLTY_STTS, CRDT_QLTY_STTS, IS_INTRGRP_SCRTY, IS_SHRT_PSTN)) as "DFLT_STTS_AC"];
ANCRDT_ENTTY_DFLT_C := ANCRDT_ENTTY_DFLT_C [calc (G_DT_DFLT_STTS_CNTRPRTY1 (APPRCH_CRDT_QLTY_STTS, DT_DFLT_STTS, IS_INTRGRP_SCRTY, IS_SHRT_PSTN)) as "DT_DFLT_STTS_AC"];

/*add a new variable Observed agent identifier with respect to the AnaCredit definition*/
ANCRDT_ENTTY_DFLT_C := ANCRDT_ENTTY_DFLT_C [calc (G_OBSRVD_AGNT_ID1 (CNSTNT_FRM_RFRNC, CNSTNT_INSTTTN_ID, OBSRVD_AGNT_INTRNL_ID)) as "OBSRVD_AGNT_ID"];

ANCRDT_ENTTY_DFLT_C := ANCRDT_ENTTY_DFLT_C [keep (CNTRPRTY_ID as "ENTTY_ID" role Identifier, DT_RFRNC role Identifier, OBSRVD_AGNT_ID  role Identifier, DFLT_STTS_AC as "DFLT_STTS", DT_DFLT_STTS_AC as "DT_DFLT_STTS")];
/*Add the LEI of the observed agent*/ANCRDT_ENTTY_DFLT_C := [ANCRDT_ENTTY_DFLT_C as "A", LEI_CDS as "B" on A.OBSRVD_AGNT_ID = B.CNTRPRTY_ID] {keep(A.ALL_VARIABLES, B.LEI as "OBSRVD_AGNT_CD")}
/*Rename the variable LEI in order to match the output requirements*/ANCRDT_ENTTY_DFLT_C := ANCRDT_ENTTY_DFLT_C [rename (LEI as "ENTTY_RIAD_CD")];

/* extract a dataset containing all loans*/
ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_C := LNS_AC;

/* join with the "transposed" Transactions-counterparties (see Transposition of the cube Transactions-counterparties) resulting in a dataset of structure {LNS_AC.*, DBTR_ID, SRVCR_ID, BNFCRY_ID, SRVCR_SCRTSTN_ID, ORGNTR_SCRTSTN_ID} */ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_TMP := [left ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_C, TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS_INSTRMNT_RLS on ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_C.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID = TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS_INSTRMNT_RLS.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID] ;

/* handle servicers - reduce the dataset to the structure of the cube Counterparty-instrument data ? ECB Collection */
ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_SRVCR := ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_SRVCR [keep (CNTRCT_ID role Identifier, DT_RFRNC role Identifier, ENTTY_ID role Identifier, ENTTY_RL role Identifier, INSTRMNT_ID role Identifier, OBSRVD_AGNT_ID role Identifier)];

/*handle originators (of securitisations) - extract all instances of the dataset where the Originator of the securitisation is not null (i.e. is present)*/
TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS_ORGNTR := ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_TMP [filter (not isnull (ORGNTR_SCRTSTN_ID))];

/*rename the variable Originator of the securitisation to Entity identifier*/
TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS_ORGNTR := ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_TMP [rename (ORGNTR_SCRTSTN_ID as "ENTTY_ID")];

/* handle originators - set the variable Counterparty role (ENTTY_RL) to "Originator (3)" */
ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_ORGNTR := ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_TMP [calc "3" as "ENTTY_RL"];

/* handle originators - reduce the dataset to the structure of the cube Counterparty-instrument data ? ECB Collection */
ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_ORGNTR := ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_ORGNTR [keep (CNTRCT_ID role Identifier, DT_RFRNC role Identifier, ENTTY_ID role Identifier, ENTTY_RL role Identifier, INSTRMNT_ID role Identifier, OBSRVD_AGNT_ID role Identifier)];

/* the cube Counterparty-instrument (ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_C) is generated by the union of all creditor(instances), all debtor(instances), all servicer(instances) and all originator(instances) */
ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_C := union (ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_CRDTR, ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_DBTR, ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_SRVCR, ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_ORGNTR);

/* join with the cube Securitisations and other credit transfer in order to add variables (i.e. Type of risk transfer) necessary to derive / generate "creditor" instances (of the cube Counterparty-instrument (ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_C)) */
ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_TMP := [inner ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_TMP as "A", SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_E as "B" on A.SCRTSTN_TRNSFR_ID = B.SCRTSTN_TRNSFR_ID] ;

/* handling creditors - Add / generate the variable Entity identifier using the function G_ENTTY_ID_CRDTR */
ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_CRDTR := ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_TMP [calc (G_ENTTY_ID_CRDTR (RLTNSHP_SCRTSTN_CRDT_TRNSFR, FDCRY, TYP_RSK_TRNSFR, OBSRVD_AGNT_ID, BNFCRY_ID, TRNSFR_ID)) as "ENTTY_ID"];

/* handling creditors - set the variable Counterparty role (ENTTY_RL) to "Creditor (1)" */
ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_CRDTR := ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_CRDTR [calc "1" as "ENTTY_RL"];

/* handling creditors - reduce the dataset to the structure of the cube Counterparty-instrument (ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_C)*/
ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_CRDTR := ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_CRDTR [keep (CNTRCT_ID role Identifier, DT_RFRNC role Identifier, ENTTY_ID role Identifier, ENTTY_RL role Identifier, INSTRMNT_ID role Identifier, OBSRVD_AGNT_ID role Identifier)];

/* handle debtors - dependent on the approach taken to represent joint liabilities in the BIRD model we extract one of two datasets containing the required information. These datasets are generated using another transformation scheme (see Preliminaries for more information) */ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_DBTR := (if CNSTNT_APPRCH_JNT_LBLTS = "1" then ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_DBTR_APPRCH1 elseif CNSTNT_APPRCH_JNT_LBLTS = "2" then ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_DBTR_APPRCH2 else null);

/* handle debtors - reduce the dataset to the structure of the cube Counterparty-instrument (ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_C)*/ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_DBTR := ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_DBTR [keep (CNTRCT_ID role Identifier, DT_RFRNC role Identifier, ENTTY_ID role Identifier, ENTTY_RL role Identifier, INSTRMNT_ID role Identifier, OBSRVD_AGNT_ID role Identifier)];

/* handle servicers - Add / generate the variable Entity identifier using the function G_ENNTY_ID_SRVR */
ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_SRVCR := ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_TMP [calc (G_ENTTY_ID_SRVCR (RLTNSHP_SCRTSTN_CRDT_TRNSFR, IS_SRVCD_OBSRVD_AGNT, TYP_RSK_TRNSFR, OBSRVD_AGNT_ID, SRVCR_ID, SRVCR_SCRTSTN_ID)) as "ENTTY_ID"];

/* handle servicers - set the variable Counterparty role (ENTTY_RL) to "Servicer (7)" */
ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_SRVCR := ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_SRVCR [calc "7" as "ENTTY_RL"];
/* extract a dataset containing all loans (including instances of the cube Positive current accounts) */ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_DBTR_APPRCH1 := LNS_AC;

/* extract a set of Counterparty identifiers from the subset of the cube Transactions-counterparties */
CNTRPRTS_SUB := INSTRMNTS_CSTMRS_E [keep (CNTRPRTY_ID)];

/* join the instruments with the (manipulated) subset TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS_SUB */ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_DBTR_APPRCH1 := [inner ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_DBTR_APPRCH1 as "A", TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS_SUB as "B" on A.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID = B.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID] {keep (B.ALL_VARIABLES, A.CNTRCT_ID, A.DT_RFRNC, A.INSTRMNT_ID, A.OBSRVD_AGNT_ID, A.OTSTNDNG_NMNL_AMNT)};
/* set the variable Counterparty role (ENTTY_RL) to "Debtor (2)" */ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_DBTR_APPRCH1 := ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_DBTR_APPRCH1 [calc "2" as "ENTTY_RL"];

/* reduce the dataset to the structure of the cube Counterparty-instrument data ? ECB Collection */ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_DBTR_APPRCH1 := ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_DBTR_APPRCH1 [keep (CNTRCT_ID role Identifier, DT_RFRNC role Identifier, ENTTY_ID role Identifier, ENTTY_RL role Identifier, INSTRMNT_ID role Identifier, OBSRVD_AGNT_ID role Identifier, JNT_LBLTY role Measure, OTSTNDNG_NMNL_AMNT role Measure, CNTRPRTY_ID role Measure, JNT_CNTRPRTY_PRCNTG role Measure)];
/*add variable Connected to the cube Joint counterparties*/JNT_CNTRPRTS_TMP := JNT_CNTRPRTS [calc "T" as "CNNCTD"];

/* join the set of Counterparty identifiers with the cube Joint counterparties temporary*/CNTRPRTY_SUB := [left CNTRPRTS_SUB as "A", JNT_CNTRPRTS_TMP as "B" on A.CNTRPRTY_ID = B.CNTRPRTY_ID] {keep (A.CNTRPRTY_ID, B.JNT_CNTRPRTY_CMPNNT, B.JNT_CNTRPRTY_PRCNTG, B.CNNCTD)};

/* extract a subset where Connected is null, i.e. where there is no instance in the cube Joint counterparties related to the given Counterparty identifier */SNGL_CNTRPRTS := CNTRPRTY_SUB [filter (isnull (CNNCTD))];
/* rename the variable Counterparty identifier into Entity identifier */SNGL_CNTRPRTS := SNGL_CNTRPRTS [rename (CNTRPRTY_ID as "ENTTY_ID")];

/* extract a subset where Connected is not null, i.e. there exists at least one instance in the cube Joint counterparties related to the given Counterparty identifier */MLTPL_CNTRPRTS := CNTRPRTY_SUB [filter (not isnull (CNNCTD))];
/* rename the variable Joint counterparty component into Entity identifier */MLTPL_CNTRPRTS := MLTPL_CNTRPRTS [rename (JNT_CNTRPRTY_CMPNNT as "ENTTY_ID")];
/* union single counterparty and multiple counterparty sets */CNTRPRTS_SUB := union (SNGL_CNTRPRTS, MLTPL_CNTRPRTS);

/* join the set INSTRMNTS_CSTMRS_E (having the structure {Instrument unique identifier, Counterparty identifier, Joint liability, Joint liability amount}) with the union counterparty set (having the structure {Counterparty identifier, JNT_CNTRPRTS.*}) */
TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS_SUB := [left INSTRMNTS_CSTMRS_E as "A", CNTRPRTS_SUB as "B" on A.CNTRPRTY_ID = B.CNTRPRTY_ID] {keep (A.ALL_VARIABLES, B.JNT_CNTRPRTY_CMPNNT, B.JNT_CNTRPRTY_PRCNTG)};
/* extract a dataset containing all instruments (including instances of the cube Positive current accounts */ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_DBTR_APPRCH2 := LNS_AC;

/* join instruments with the subset of Transactions-counterparties */
ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_DBTR_APPRCH2 := [inner ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_DBTR_APPRCH2 as "A", INSTRMNTS_CSTMRS_E as "B" on A.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID = B.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID] {keep (B.ALL_VARIABLES, A.CNTRCT_ID, A.DT_RFRNC, A.INSTRMNT_ID, A.OBSRVD_AGNT_ID)};
/* set the variable Counterparty role (ENTTY_RL) to "Debtor (2)" */ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_DBTR_APPRCH2 := ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_DBTR_APPRCH2 [calc "2" as "ENTTY_RL"];

/* reduce the dataset to the structure of the cube Counterparty-instrument (ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_C)*/ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_DBTR_APPRCH2 := ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_DBTR_APPRCH2 [keep (CNTRCT_ID role Identifier, DT_RFRNC role Identifier, ENTTY_ID role Identifier, ENTTY_RL role Identifier, INSTRMNT_ID role Identifier, OBSRVD_AGNT_ID role Identifier, JNT_LBLTY role Measure, JNT_LBLTY_AMNT role Measure)];
ANCRDT_ENTTY_RSK_C := CNTRPRTS_E;
ANCRDT_ENTTY_RSK_C := ANCRDT_ENTTY_RSK_C [calc (G_PD2 (APPRCH_PRDNTL_PRPSS, PD)) as "PD_AC"];

/*add a new variable Observed agent identifier with respect to the AnaCredit definition*/
ANCRDT_ENTTY_RSK_C := ANCRDT_ENTTY_RSK_C [calc (G_OBSRVD_AGNT_ID1 (CNSTNT_FRM_RFRNC, CNSTNT_INSTTTN_ID, OBSRVD_AGNT_INTRNL_ID)) as "OBSRVD_AGNT_ID"];
ANCRDT_ENTTY_RSK_C := ANCRDT_ENTTY_RSK_C [keep (OBSRVD_AGNT_ID as "OBSRVD_AGNT_CD" role Identifier, DT_RFRNC role Identifier, CNTRPRTY_ID as "ENTTY_RIAD_ID" role Identifier, PD_AC as "PD")];
/*Add the LEI of the observed agent*/ANCRDT_ENTTY_RSK_C := [ANCRDT_ENTTY_RSK_C as "A", LEI_CDS as "B" on A.OBSRVD_AGNT_ID = B.CNTRPRTY_ID] {keep(A.ALL_VARIABLES, B.LEI as "OBSRVD_AGNT_CD")};
/*Rename the variable LEI so that it matches the output requirement*/ANCRDT_ENTTY_RSK_C := ANCRDT_ENTTY_RSK_C[rename (LEI as "ENTTY_RIAD_CD")];
/* extract a dataset containing all loans*/ANCRDT_FNNCL_C := LNS_AC;
/*add variable Is intragroup security with default value 'False (F)'*/ANCRDT_FNNCL_C := ANCRDT_FNNCL_C [calc "F" as "IS_INTRGRP_SCTRY"];
/*add variable Is short position with default value 'False (F)'*/ANCRDT_FNNCL_C := ANCRDT_FNNCL_C [calc "F" as "IS_SHRT_PSTN"];
/* create a structure {Securitisation/transfer identifier, Type of risk transfer} */SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_TMP := SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_E [keep (SCRTSTN_TRNSFR_ID, TYP_RSK_TRNSFR)];

/* add the following variables from the related instance of the cube Securitisations and other credit transfers: Type of risk transfer (TYP_RSK_TRNSFR) */ANCRDT_FNNCL_C := [left ANCRDT_FNNCL_C as "A", SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_TMP as "B" on A.SCRTSTN_TRNSFR_ID = B.SCRTSTN_TRNSFR_ID] {keep (A.ALL_VARIABLES, B.TYP_RSK_TRNSFR)};

/* create the variable Type of securitisation using the function G_TYP_SCRTSTN1 */ANCRDT_FNNCL_C := ANCRDT_FNNCL_C [calc (G_TYP_SCRTSTN1 (RLTNSHP_SCRTSTN_CRDT_TRNSFR, TYP_RSK_TRNSFR)) as "TYP_SCRTSTN"];
/* create the variable Transferred amount using the function G_TRNSFRRD_AMNT1 */ANCRDT_FNNCL_C := ANCRDT_FNNCL_C [calc (G_TRNSFRRD_AMNT1 (PRCNTG_TRNSFRRD, OTSTNDNG_NMNL_AMNT)) as "TRNSFRRD_AMNT"];

/*create a new variable Default status AnaCredit using the function G_DFLT_STTS1*/ANCRDT_FNNCL_C := ANCRDT_FNNCL_C [calc (G_DFLT_STTS1 (APPRCH_CRDT_QLTY_STTS, CRDT_QLTY_STTS, IS_INTRGRP_SCRTY, IS_SHRT_PSTN)) as "DFLT_STTS_AC"];

/*create a new variable Date of the default status AnaCredit using the function G_DFLT_STTS1*/ANCRDT_FNNCL_C := ANCRDT_FNNCL_C [calc (G_DT_DFLT_STTS1 (APPRCH_CRDT_QLTY_STTS, DT_DFLT_STTS)) as "DT_DFLT_STTS_AC"];

/* reduce the dataset to the structure of the cube Financial data ECB Collection */ANCRDT_FNNCL_C := ANCRDT_FNNCL_C [keep (ACCRD_INTRST, ANNLSD_AGRD_RT, ARRRS, CNTRCT_ID role Identifier, DFLT_STTS_AC as "DFLT_STTS", DT_DFLT_STTS_AC as "DT_DFLT_STTS", DT_NXT_INTRST_RT_RST, DT_PST_D, DT_RFRNC role Identifier, INSTRMNT_ID role Identifier, OBSRVD_AGNT_ID role Identifier, OFF_BLNC_SHT_AMNT, OTSTNDNG_NMNL_AMNT, TRNSFRRD_AMNT, TYP_SCRTSTN)];
/* create a dataset containing all loans*/ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_C := LNS_AC;

/* add the following variables from the related credit facility to each instrument: Type of facility (TYP_FCLTY), Legal final maturity date (DT_LGL_FNL_MTRTY), Commitment amount at inception (CMMTMNT_INCPTN), Inception date (DT_INCPTN) */
ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_C := [inner UNQ_CRDT_FCLTS_INSTRMNTS as "A", ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_C as "B" on A.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID = B.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID] {keep (B.ALL_VARIABLES, A.TYP_FCLTY as "TYP_FCLTY", A.DT_LGL_FNL_MTRTY as "DT_LGL_FNL_MTRTY_CF", A.CMMTMNT_INCPTN as "CMMTMNT_INCPTN_CF", A.DT_INCPTN as "DT_INCPTN_CF")};

/* Create the variable Legal final maturity date with respect to the AnaCredit definition. Please note that the result is stored in a new (temporary) variable named DT_LGL_FNL_MTRTY_AC which will be renamed in the end of the scheme */
ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_C := ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_C [calc (G_DT_LGL_FNL_MTRTY1 (TYP_FCLTY, DT_LGL_FNL_MTRTY, DT_LGL_FNL_MTRTY_CF)) as "DT_LGL_FNL_MTRTY_AC"];

/* Create the variable Commitment amount at inception with respect to the AnaCredit definition. Please note that the result is stored in a new (temporary) variable named CMMTMNT_INCPTN_AC which will be renamed in the end of the scheme */
ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_C := ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_C [calc (G_CMMTMNT_INCPTN1 (CMMTMNT_INCPTN, CMMTMNT_INCPTN_CF)) as "CMMTMNT_INCPTN_AC"];

/* Create the variable Purpose with respect to the AnaCredit definition. Please note that the result is stored in a new (temporary) variable named PRPS_AC which will be renamed in the end of the scheme */
ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_C := ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_C [calc (G_PRPS1 (TYP_INSTRMNT, IS_DBT_FNNCNG, PRPS)) as "PRPS_AC"];

/* Create the variable Inception date with respect to the AnaCredit definition. Please note that the result is stored in a new (temporary) variable named DT_INCPTN_AC which will be renamed in the end of the scheme */
ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_C := ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_C [calc (G_DT_INCPTN1 (DT_INCPTN, DT_INCPTN_CF)) as "DT_INCPTN_AC"];

/* adjust variable Type of instrument in order to match the AnaCredit domain. Please note that the result is stored in a new (temporary) variable named TYP_INSTRMNT_AC which will be renamed in the end of the scheme */
ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_C := ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_C [calc (G_TYP_INSTRMNT_AC (TYP_INSTRMNT, IS_RVLVNG_LN, IS_CRDT_LN_OTHR_RV_CRDT)) as "TYP_INSTRMNT_AC"];

/* reduce the dataset to the structure of the cube Instrument (ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_C) and rename AnaCredit specific variables like TYP_INSTRMNT_AC into TYP_INSTRMNT. Additionally set the dimensions of the cube Instrument (ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_C)*/
ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_C := ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_C [keep (CMMTMNT_INCPTN, CNTRCT_ID role Identifier, CRRNCY_DNMNTN, DT_END_INTRST_ONLY, DT_INCPTN_AC as "DT_INCPTN", DT_LGL_FNL_MTRTY, DT_RFRNC role Identifier, DT_STTLMNT, FDCRY, FV_CHNG_CR_BFR_PRCHS, INSTRMNT_ID role Identifier, INTRST_RT_CP, INTRST_RT_FLR, INTRST_RT_RST_FRQNCY, INTRST_RT_SPRD, OBSRVD_AGNT_ID role Identifier, PRJCT_FNNC_LN, PRPS_AC as "PRPS", PYMNT_FRQNCY, RCRS, RFRNC_RT, RPYMNT_RGHTS, SBRDNTD_DBT, SYNDCTD_CNTRCT_ID, TYP_AMRTSTN, TYP_INSTRMNT_AC as "TYP_INSTRMNT", TYP_INTRST_RT)];

/*get non real estate protection content*/
ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C_NN_RL_ESTT := NT_RL_ET_PRTCTN_RCVD_AC;

/*reduce non real estate protection content to output structure*/
ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C_NN_RL_ESTT := ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C_NN_RL_ESTT [keep (INSTRMNT_ID role Identifier, DT_RFRNC role Identifier, CNTRCT_ID role Identifier, OBSRVD_AGNT_ID role Identifier, PRTCTN_ALLCTD_VL role Measure, PRTCTN_ID role Identifier, THRD_PRTY_PRRTY_CLMS role Measure)];

/*reduce the dataset to the structure of the AnaCredit output cube*/
ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C := ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C [keep (INSTRMNT_ID role Identifier, DT_RFRNC role Identifier, CNTRCT_ID role Identifier, OBSRVD_AGNT_ID role Identifier, PRTCTN_ALLCTD_VL role Measure, PRTCTN_ID role Identifier, THRD_PRTY_PRRTY_CLMS role Measure)];

/*add generated instrument-protection combinations for cash reserve of factoring operation*/
ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C := union (ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C, CSH_RSRV_FCTRNG_ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C);

/*Add the LEI of the observed agent*/ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C := [inner ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C as "A", LEI_CDS as "B" on A.OBSRVD_AGNT_ID = B.CNTRPRTY_ID] {keep (A.INSTRMNT_ID role Identifier, A.DT_RFRNC role Identifier, A.CNTRCT_ID role Identifier, B.LEI as "OBSRVD_AGNT_CD" role Identifier, A.PRTCTN_ALLCTD_VL role Measure, A.PRTCTN_ID role Identifier, A.THRD_PRTY_PRRTY_CLMS role Measure)};

/*get real estate protection content*/
ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C_RL_ESTT := RL_ESTT_PRTCTN_RCVD_AC;

/*create structure {Third party priority claim against the protection, Instrument unique identifier, Protection item identifier}, where the Third party priority claim against the protection is the greatest available*/
THRD_PRTY_PRRTY_CLM_PR_CMBNTN := max (ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C_RL_ESTT.THRD_PRTY_PRRTY_CLM_PR_CMBNTN) group by (INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID, PRTCTN_ITM_ID);

/*create structure {Protection allocated value, Instrument unique identifier, Protection item identifier} where the Protection allocated value is the sum of all Protection allocated values for each combination of Instrument unique identifier and Protection item identifier*/
PRTCTN_ALLCTD_VL_PR_CMBNTN := sum (ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C_RL_ESTT.PRTCTN_ALLCTD_VL) group by (INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID, PRTCTN_ITM_ID);

/*reduce real estate protection content to output structure*/
ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C_RL_ESTT := ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C_RL_ESTT [keep (INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID, PRTCTN_ITM_ID, CNTRCT_ID, DT_RFRNC, INSTRMNT_ID)];

/*add the Third party priority claim against the protection for each combination of Instrument unique identifier and Protection item identifier*/
ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C_RL_ESTT := [inner ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C_RL_ESTT as "A", THRD_PRTY_PRRTY_CLM_PR_CMBNTN as "B" on A.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID = B.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID and A.PRTCTN_ITM_ID = B.PRTCTN_ITM_ID] {keep (A.ALL_VARIABLES, B.THRD_PRTY_PRRTY_CLMS)};

/*add the Protection allocated value for each combination of Instrument unique identifier and Protection item identifier*/
ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C_RL_ESTT := [inner ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C_RL_ESTT as "A", PRTCTN_ALLCTD_VL_PR_CMBNTN as "B" on A.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID = B.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID and A.PRTCTN_ITM_ID = B.PRTCTN_ITM_ID] {keep (A.ALL_VARIABLES, B.PRTCTN_ALLCTD_VL)};

/*create a set containing real estate protection content and non real estate protection content*/
ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C := union (ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C_RL_ESTT, ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C_NN_RL_ESTT);

/* Create the variable Observed agent identifier with respect to the AnaCredit definition */
ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C := ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C [calc (G_OBSRVD_AGNT_ID1 (CNSTNT_FRM_RFRNC, INSTTTN_ID, OBSRVD_AGNT_INTRNL_ID)) as "OBSRVD_AGNT_ID" role Identifier];

/* extract the dataset used to generate the debtor instances of the cube Counterparty-instrument data ? ECB Collection with additional variables Joint liability, Outstanding nominal amount, Joint counterparty percentage and Counterparty identifier */ANCRDT_JNT_LBLTS_APPRCH1 := ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_DBTR_APPRCH1;

/* filter out all the instances where the Counterparty identifier equals the Entity identifier, i.e. the cases where there are no joint counterparties */ANCRDT_JNT_LBLTS_APPRCH1 := ANCRDT_JNT_LBLTS_APPRCH1 [filter (ENTTY_ID <> CNTRPRTY_ID)];

/* add the variable Joint liability amount as the result of the Outstanding nominal amount multiplied by the Joint counterparty percentage */ANCRDT_JNT_LBLTS_APPRCH1 := ANCRDT_JNT_LBLTS_APPRCH1 [calc OTSTNDNG_NMNL_AMNT * JNT_CNTRPRTY_PRCNTG as "JNT_LBLTY_AMNT"];

/* reduce the dataset to the structure of the cube Joint liabilities data ? ECB Collection */ANCRDT_JNT_LBLTS_APPRCH1 := ANCRDT_JNT_LBLTS_APPRCH1 [keep (CNTRCT_ID, DT_RFRNC, ENTTY_ID, INSTRMNT_ID, JNT_LBLTY_AMNT, OBSRVD_AGNT_ID)];

/* extract the dataset used to generate the debtor instances of the cube Counterparty-instrument data ? ECB Collection with additional variables Joint liability, Joint liability amount */ANCRDT_JNT_LBLTS_APPRCH2 := ANCRDT_ENTTY_INSTRMNT_DBTR_APPRCH2;
/* filter out all the instances the variable Joint liability equals "No joint liability (0)" */ANCRDT_JNT_LBLTS_APPRCH2 := ANCRDT_JNT_LBLTS_APPRCH2 [filter (JNT_LBLTY <> "0")];

/* dependent on the approach taken to represent joint liabilities in the BIRD model we extract one of two datasets containing the required information. These datasets are generated using another transformation scheme (see Preliminaries for more information) */
ANCRDT_JNT_LBLTS_C := (if CNSTNT_APPRCH_JNT_LBLTS = "1" then ANCRDT_JNT_LBLTS_APPRCH1 elseif CNSTNT_APPRCH_JNT_LBLTS = "2" then ANCRDT_JNT_LBLTS_APPRCH2 else null);

/* reduce the dataset to the structure of the cube Joint liabilities data ? ECB Collection */
ANCRDT_JNT_LBLTS_C := ANCRDT_JNT_LBLTS_C [keep (CNTRCT_ID role Identifier, DT_RFRNC role Identifier, ENTTY_ID role Identifier, INSTRMNT_ID role Identifier, JNT_LBLTY_AMNT, OBSRVD_AGNT_ID role Identifier)];

/*join CNTRPRTS_CDS through CNTRPRTY_ID to "translate" OBSRVD_AGNT_ID and CNTRPRTY_ID in RIAD code (CNTRPRTY_EXTRNL_ID) as OBSRVD_AGNT_CD and ENTTY_RIAD_CD*/
ANCRDT_JNT_LBLTS_C := [inner ANCRDT_JNT_LBLTS_C as "A", CNTRPRTS_CDS as "B" on A.OBSRVD_AGNT_ID = B.CNTRPRTY_ID and B.TYP_CNTRPRTY_EXTRNL_ID = "RIAD code"] {keep (A.CNTRCT_ID role Identifier, A.DT_RFRNC role Identifier, A.ENTTY_ID role Identifier, A.INSTRMNT_ID role Identifier, A.JNT_LBLTY_AMNT, B.CNTRPRTY_EXTRNL_ID as "OBSRVD_AGNT_CD"  role Identifier)};

/*reduce the dataset Non real estate protection content (NT_RL_ET_PRTCTN_RCVD_AC) to the structure of the output cube Protection received data - ECB Collection (ANCRDT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C)*/
PRTCTNS_OTHR := NT_RL_ET_PRTCTN_RCVD_AC [keep (PRTCTN_VLTN_DT as "DT_PRTCTN_VL" role Measure, PRTCTN_ID role Identifier, PRTCTN_PRVDR_ID role Measure, PRTCTN_VL role Measure, PRTCTN_VLTN_APPRCH role Measure, RL_ESTT_CLLTRL_LCTN role Measure, TYP_PRTCTN role Measure, TYP_PRTCTN_VL role Measure, ORGNL_PRTCTN_VL role Measure, DT_ORGNL_PRTCTN_VL role Measure, DT_MTRTY_PRTCTN role Measure)];

/*extract the lowest value of the variable Maturity date of the protection per Protection item identifier (i.e. per real estate protection)*/
DT_MTRTY_PR_PRTCTN := min (RL_ESTT_PRTCTN_RCVD_AC.DT_MTRTY_PRTCTN) group by (PRTCTN_ITM_ID);

/* reduce the structure of the dataset Real estate protection content (RL_ESTT_PRTCTN_RCVD_AC) in order to aggregate over all claims per real estate protection (the real estate protection represents the protection in AnaCredit, not the claim(s)).*/PRTCTNS_RL_ESTT := RL_ESTT_PRTCTN_RCVD_AC [keep (PRTCTN_VLTN_DT as "DT_PRTCTN_VL" role Measure, PRTCTN_ITM_ID as "PRTCTN_ID" role Measure, PRTCTN_PRVDR_ID role Measure, PRTCTN_VL role Measure, PRTCTN_VLTN_APPRCH role Measure, RL_ESTT_CLLTRL_LCTN role Measure, TYP_PRTCTN role Measure, TYP_PRTCTN_VL role Measure, ORGNL_PRTCTN_VL role Measure, DT_ORGNL_PRTCTN_VL role Measure)];

/*add the variable Maturity date of the protection from the dataset Maturity date of the protection per protection (DT_MTRTY_PR_PRTCTN)*/PRTCTNS_RL_ESTT := [inner PRTCTNS_RL_ESTT as "A", DT_MTRTY_PR_PRTCTN as "B" on A.PRTCTN_ID = B.PRTCTN_ITM_ID] {keep (A.DT_PRTCTN_VL, A.PRTCTN_ID, A.PRTCTN_PRVDR_ID, A.PRTCTN_VL, A.PRTCTN_VLTN_APPRCH, A.RL_ESTT_CLLTRL_LCTN, A.TYP_PRTCTN, A.TYP_PRTCTN_VL, A.ORGNL_PRTCTN_VL, A.DT_ORGNL_PRTCTN_VL, B.DT_MTRTY_PRTCTN)};

/*the output cube Protection received data - ECB Collection (ANCRDT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C) is simply the union of the datasets Protections real estate (PRTCTNS_RL_ESTT) and Protections other (PRTCTNS_OTHR)*/
ANCRDT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C := union (PRTCTNS_RL_ESTT, PRTCTNS_OTHR);

/* Create the variable Observed agent identifier with respect to the AnaCredit definition */
ANCRDT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C := ANCRDT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C [calc (G_OBSRVD_AGNT_ID1 (CNSTNT_FRM_RFRNC, INSTTTN_ID, OBSRVD_AGNT_INTRNL_ID)) as "OBSRVD_AGNT_ID" role Identifier];

/*add generated cash reserve protections for factoring operations*/
ANCRDT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C := union (ANCRDT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C, CSH_RSRV_FCTRNG_ANCRDT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C);

/*Add the LEI of the observed agent*/
ANCRDT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C := [inner ANCRDT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C as "A", LEI_CDS as "B" on A.OBSRVD_AGNT_ID = B.CNTRPRTY_ID] {keep (A.DT_PRTCTN_VL, A.PRTCTN_ID, A.PRTCTN_PRVDR_ID, A.PRTCTN_VL, A.PRTCTN_VLTN_APPRCH, A.RL_ESTT_CLLTRL_LCTN, A.TYP_PRTCTN, A.TYP_PRTCTN_VL, A.ORGNL_PRTCTN_VL, A.DT_ORGNL_PRTCTN_VL, A.DT_RFRNC, B.DT_MTRTY_PRTCTN, B.LEI as "OBSRVD_AGNT_CD" role Identifier)};

/* join Credit facilities-instruments (CRDT_FCLTS_INSTMNTS_E) with the Commitments given - enriched (CMMTNMTS_GVN_E) */
CRDT_FCLTS_INSTRMNTS_CRDT_FCLTS := [inner CRDT_FCLTS_INSTRMNTS_E as "A", CMMTMNTS_GVN_E as "B" on CMMTMNT_UNQ_ID];

/* {Instrument unique identifier, Inception date} where the Inception date is the minimum of all credit facilities' Inception dates related to such an instrument */CRDT_FCLTS_INSTRMNTS_CRDT_FCLTS_SUB := min (CRDT_FCLTS_INSTRMNTS_CRDT_FCLTS.DT_INCPTN) group by (INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID);

/* {Credit facilities-instruments.*, Credit facilities.*} where for each instrument (i.e. Instrument unique identifier) there is only one related credit facility (i.e. Credit facility unique identifier) which is the one with the lowest value in the variable Inception date (DT_INCPTN)*/UNQ_CRDT_FCLTS_INSTRMNTS := [inner CRDT_FCLTS_INSTRMNTS_CRDT_FCLTS as "A", CRDT_FCLTS_INSTRMNTS_CRDT_FCLTS_SUB as "B" on A.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID = B.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID and A.DT_INCPTN = B.DT_INCPTN];

/*Generate the cube CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC  for current accounts that are liabilities for the reporting requirements of AnaCredit
join Deposits that are liabilities - enriched (DPSTS_THT_LBLTS_E)  with the related credit facility (UNQ_CRDT_FCLTS_INSTRMNTS) variables transferred from the related credit facility: Annualised agreed rate (ANNLSD_AGRD_RT), Assessment approach for credit quality status (APPRCH_CRDT_QLTY_STTS), Credit quality status (CRDT_QLTY_STTS), Is debt financing (IS_DBT_FNNCNG), Date of default status (DT_DFLT_STTS), Date of performing status (DT_PRFRMNG_STTS), Next interest rate reset date (DT_NXT_INTRST_RT_RST), Forbearance and renegotiation status (FRBRNC_STTS), Project finance loan (PRJCT_FNNC_LN), Purpose (PRPS), Recourse (RCRS), Is retail exposure (IS_RTL_EXPSR), Is serviced by the observed agent (IS_SRVCD_OBSRVD_AGNT), Syndicated contract identifier (SYNDCTD_CNTRCT_ID), Type of amortisation (TYP_AMRTSTN), Inception date (DT_INCPTN), Interest rate cap (INTRST_RT_CP), Interest rate floor (INTRST_RT_FLR), Interest rate reset frequency (INTRST_RT_RST_FRQNCY), Interest rate spread/margin (INTRST_RT_SPRD), Type of interest rate (TYP_INTRST_RT), Commitment amount at inception (CMMTMNT_INCPTN), Payment frequency (PYMNT_FRQNCY), Reference rate (RFRNC_RT) */CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := [inner UNQ_CRDT_FCLTS_INSTRMNTS as "A", DPSTS_THT_LBLTS_E as "B" on A.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID = B.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID and B.TYP_INSTRMNT in ("260")] {keep (B.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID, B.PRSPCTV_ID, B.TYP_INSTRMNT, B.ACCMLTD_CHNGS_FV, B.ACCMLTD_CHNGS_FV_CR,  B.ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN, B.CRRNCY_DNMNTN, B.CRRYNG_AMNT, B.DT_LGL_FNL_MTRTY, B.DT_RFRNC,  B.DT_STTLMNT, B.FV, B.FV_CHNG_HDG_ACCNTNG, B.FV_HRRCHY, B.FVO_DSGNTN,  B.GRSS_CRRYNG_AMNT_E_INTRST, B.IS_HFS, B.OBSRVD_AGNT_INTRNL_ID, B.OTSTNDNG_NMNL_AMNT, B.SBRDNTD_DBT, A.ANNLSD_AGRD_RT, A.APPRCH_CRDT_QLTY_STTS, A.CMMTMNT_INCPTN, A.CRDT_QLTY_STTS,  A.DT_DFLT_STTS, A.IS_DBT_FNNCNG, A.DT_PRFRMNG_STTS, A.DT_NXT_INTRST_RT_RST, A.FRBRNC_STTS, A.PRJCT_FNNC_LN, A.PRPS, A.RCRS, A.IS_RTL_EXPSR,  A.IS_SRVCD_OBSRVD_AGNT, A.SYNDCTD_CNTRCT_ID, A.TYP_AMRTSTN, A.DT_INCPTN, A.INTRST_RT_CP, A.INTRST_RT_FLR, A.INTRST_RT_RST_FRQNCY, A.INTRST_RT_SPRD, A.TYP_INTRST_RT, A.PYMNT_FRQNCY, A.RFRNC_RT)}

/* join Current accounts that are liabilities for the reporting requirements of AnaCredit whith the Current accounts informations - enriched (CRRNT_ACCNT_INF_E)  to enrich the current accounts that are liabilities with the information not present in Deposits that are liabilities - enriched; add Accrued interest, Cumulative recoveries since default, Contract identifier, Fiduciary,  Instrument identifier and Off-balance sheet amount*/CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := [inner CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC as "A", CRRNT_ACCNT as "B" on INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID = B.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID] {keep (A.ALL_VARIABLES, B.ACCRD_INTRST, B.CMLTV_RCVRS_SNC_DFLT, B.CNTRCT_ID, B.FDCR, B.INSTRMNT_ID, B.OFF_BLNC_SHT_AMNT)};

/* the variable Connected factoring operation identifier for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is null by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc null as "CNNCTD_FCTRNG_ID"];

/* the variable Date of the forbearance status for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is null by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc null as "DT_FRBRNC_STTS"];

/* the variable Fair value changes due to hedge accounting for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is null by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc null as "FV_CHNG_HDG_ACCNTNG"];

/* the variable Impairment assessment method for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is null by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc null as "IMPRMNT_ASSSSMNT_MTHD"];

/* the variable Impairment status for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is null by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc null as "IMPRMNT_STTS"];

/* the variable Is credit line other than revolving credit for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is "Not applicable (0)" by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc "0" as "IS_CRDT_LN_OTHR_RV_CRDT"];

/* the variable Is credit line other than revolving credit for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is "Not applicable (0)" by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc "0" as "IS_CRDT_LN_OTHR_RV_CRDT"];

/* the variable Is revolving loan for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is "Not applicable (0)" by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc "0" as "IS_RVLVNG_LN"];

/* the variable Prudential portfolio for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is "Not applicable (0)" by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc "0" as "PRDNTL_PRTFL"];

/* the variable Sources of encumbrance for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is null by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc null as "SRC_ENCMBRNC"];

/* the variable Accumulated changes in fair value due to credit risk for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is 0 by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc 0 as "ACCMLTD_CHNGS_FV_CR"];

/* the End date of interest only for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is null by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc null as "DT_END_INTRST_ONLY"];

/* the Repayment rights for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is "On demand or short notice (1)" by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc "1" as "RPYMNT_RGHTS"];

/* the Fair value changes due to changes in credit risk before purchase for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is null by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc null as "FV_CHNG_CR_BFR_PRCHS"];

/* the variable Date of past due for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is null by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc null as "DT_PST_D"];

/* the variable Relationship with securitisation and credit transfer for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is Not applicable by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc "0" as "RLTNSHP_SCRTSTN_CRDT_TRNSFR"];

/* the variable Securitisation/transfer identifier for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is null by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc null as "SCRTSTN_TRNSFR_ID"];
/*Adding the Counterparty identifier (CNTRPRTY_ID)*/CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := [CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC as "A", INSTRMNTS_CSTMRS_E as "B" on INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID]
/*Adding the counterparty information*/CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := [CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC as "A", CNTRPRTS_E as "B" on CNTRPRTY_ID]

/* the variable Accumulated impairment for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is 0 by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc 0 as "ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT"];

/* the variable Accumulated impairment GAAP compnent 1 for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is 0 by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc 0 as "ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT_GAAP1"];

/* the variable Accumulated impairment GAAP component 2 for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is 0 by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc 0 as "ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT_GAAP2"];

/* the variable Accumulated negative value adjustments (Market risk induced) for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is 0 by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc 0 as "ACCMLTD_NGTV_VL_ADJSTMNT_MR"];

/* the variable Accumulated write-offs for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is 0 by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc 0 as "ACCMLTD_WRTFFS"];

/* the variable Accounting classification for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is "Not applicable (0)" by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc "0" as "ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN"];

/* the variable Arrears for the instrument for a Positive current account in AnaCredit is 0 by default */
CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC := CRRNT_ACCNTS_LBLTS_AC [calc 0 as "ARRRS"];

/*The variable Accounting classification (ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN) is set to 'Cash balances at central banks and other demand deposits (16)'*/CSH_ON_HND_FINREP := CSH_ON_HND_E [calc "16" as "ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN"]
/*The variable Hedged or hedging instrument (HDG_INSTRMNT) is set to 'Not applicable (0)'*/CSH_ON_HND_FINREP := CSH_ON_HND_FINREP [calc "0" as "HDG_INSTRMNT"]
/*The variable Institutional sector (INSTTTNL_SCTR) is set to 'Not applicable (0)'*/CSH_ON_HND_FINREP := CSH_ON_HND_FINREP [calc "0" as "INSTTTNL_SCTR"]
/*The variable Repayment rights (RPYMNT_RGHTS) is set to 'Not applicable (0)'*/CSH_ON_HND_FINREP := CSH_ON_HND_FINREP [calc "0" as "RPYMNT_RGHTS"]
/*The variable Type of accounting item (TYP_ACCNTNG_ITM) is set to 'Cash on hands (10)'*/CSH_ON_HND_FINREP := CSH_ON_HND_FINREP [calc "10" as "TYP_ACCNTNG_ITM"]
/*The variable Type of hedge (TYP_HDG) is set to 'Not applicable (0)'*/CSH_ON_HND_FINREP := CSH_ON_HND_FINREP [calc "0" as "TYP_HDG"]
/*The variable Type of instrument (TYP_INSTRMNT) is set to 'Not applicable (0)'*/CSH_ON_HND_FINREP := CSH_ON_HND_FINREP [calc "0" as "TYP_INSTRMNT"]

/*copy the enriched cash reserve*/
CSH_RSRV_AC := FCTRNG_AXLRY_E;

/*extract all Instrument unique identifier for which a cash reserve should be generated*/
RLVNT_INSTRMNT_IDS := CSH_RSRV_AC [keep (INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID)];

/*set the Real estate collateral location value to "not applicable (0)" by default*/
CSH_RSRV_AC := CSH_RSRV_AC [calc "0" as "RL_ESTT_CLLTRL_LCTN"];
/*set the Protection valuation approach value to "Other type of valuation (4)" by default*/CSH_RSRV_AC := CSH_RSRV_AC [calc "4" as "PRTCTN_VLTN_APPRCH"];

/*add the variable Observed agent identifier*/
CSH_RSRV_AC := CSH_RSRV_AC [calc (G_OBSRVD_AGNT_ID1 (CNSTNT_FRM_RFRNC, CNSTNT_INSTTTN_ID, OBSRVD_AGNT_INTRNL_ID)) as "OBSRVD_AGNT_ID"];

/*extract the structure of the cube Instrument-protection received data - ECB Collection (ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C)*/
CSH_RSRV_FCTRNG_ANCRDT_INSTRMNT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C := CSH_RSRV_AC [keep (INSTRMNT_ID role Identifier, DT_RFRNC role Identifier, CNTRCT_ID role Identifier, OBSRVD_AGNT_ID role Identifier, PRTCTN_ALLCTD_VL role Measure, PRTCTN_ID role Identifier, THRD_PRTY_PRRTY_CLMS role Measure)];

/*extract the structure of the cube Protection received data - ECB Collection (ANCRDT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C)*/
CSH_RSRV_FCTRNG_ANCRDT_PRTCTN_RCVD_C := CSH_RSRV_AC [keep (PRTCTN_ID role Identifier, DT_RFRNC role Identifier, OBSRVD_AGNT_ID  role Identifier, DT_MTRTY_CSH_RSRV as "DT_MTRTY_PRTCTN" role Measure, DT_ORGNL_CSH_RSRV_AMNT as "DT_ORGNL_PRTCTN_VL" role Measure, ORGNL_CSH_RSRV_AMNT as "ORGNL_PRTCTN_VL" role Measure, CSH_RSRV_AMNT as "PRTCTN_VL" role Measure, DBTR_ID as "PRTCTN_PRVDR_ID" role Measure, PRTCTN_VLTN_APPRCH role Measure, RL_ESTT_CLLTRL_LCTN role Measure, TYP_PRTCTN role Measure, TYP_PRTCTN_VL role Measure)];

/*retrieve a dataset of structure {Instrument unique identifier, Debtor identifier}*/
TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS_INSTRMNT_RLS_SUB := [inner TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS_INSTRMNT_RLS as "A", RLVNT_INSTRMNT_IDS as "B" on A.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID = B.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID] {keep (A.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID, A.DBTR_ID)};

/*add the debtor to the dataset CSH_RSRV_AC*/
CSH_RSRV_AC := [inner CSH_RSRV_AC as "A", TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS_INSTRMNT_RLS_SUB as "B" on A.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID = B.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID] {keep (A.ALL_VARIABLES, B.DBTR_ID)};

/*add a new variable Protection identifier which is created by the concatenation of the Instrument unique identifier with the term "_CSH_RSRV_PRTCTN"*/
CSH_RSRV_AC := CSH_RSRV_AC [calc INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID || "_CSH_RSRV_PRTCTN" as "PRTCTN_ID"];

/*set the Protection allocated value to 0 by default*/
CSH_RSRV_AC := CSH_RSRV_AC [calc 0 as "PRTCTN_ALLCTD_VL"];

/*set the Third party priority claims against the protection to 0 by default*/
CSH_RSRV_AC := CSH_RSRV_AC [calc 0 as "THRD_PRTY_PRRTY_CLMS"];

/*add the reference date*/

call DELTA_VALUE(DBT_SCRTS_DBTRS_FINREP, INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID, DT_RFRNC, ACCMLTD_CHNGS_FV, T0, T_CRRNT, DBT_SCRTS_DBTRS_FVH);

call DELTA_VALUE(DRVTVS_CSTMRS_LBLTS_FINREP, INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID, DT_RFRNC, ACCMLTD_CHNGS_FV, T0, T_CRRNT, DRVTVS_LBLTS_FVH);

ENTTY_INFRMTN := ENTTY_INFRMTN [calc (if IS_INTRGRP_SCRTY = "T" or IS_SHRT_PSTN = "T" then "0" else IMPRMNT_STTS ) as "IMPRMNT_STTS_SHS"];

ENTTY_INFRMTN := ENTTY_INFRMTN [calc ( if TYP_PRDTL_CNSLDTN = "T" or IS_SHRT_PSTN = "T" or IS_INTRGRP_SCRTY = "T" then null else (if CNSTNT_ACCNTNG_RL_WTN_GRP="T" then CRRYNG_AMNT else  (if TYP_PRDTL_CNSLDTN = 1 then CRRYNG_AMNT else PRCNTG_CNSLDTN* CRRYNG_AMNT))) as "CRRYNG_AMNT_SHS"];

ENTTY_INFRMTN := ENTTY_INFRMTN [calc ( if IS_INTRGRP_SCRTY = "T" or IS_SHRT_PSTN = "T" then null else (if CNSTNT_ACCNTNG_RL_WTN_GRP="T" then ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT else (if TYP_PRDTL_CNSLDTN = 1 then ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT else PRCNTG_CNSLDTN*ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT  ))) as "ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT_SHS"];

ENTTY_INFRMTN := ENTTY_INFRMTN [calc (if IS_INTRGRP_SCRTY = "T" or IS_SHRT_PSTN = "T" then null else  (if CNSTNT_ACCNTNG_RL_WTN_GRP="T" then EXPSR_VL else (if TYP_PRDTL_CNSLDTN = 1 then EXPSR_VL else PRCNTG_CNSLDTN*EXPSR_VL ))) as "EXPSR_VL_SHS"];

/*The variable Type of accounting consolidation (TYP_ACCNTNG_CNSLDTN) in the cube / data set Scope of the group: “entity-by-entity” - Reference (unfolded) (F_40_01_REF_UNFLDD) is restricted to the values 'Full consolidation (1)', 'Proportional consolidation (2)', 'Equity method (3)', 'Other than Full consolidation, Proportional consolidation, Equity method (4)'*/F_40_01_REF_UNFLDD := F_40_01_REF_UNFLDD [filter(TYP_ACCNTNG_CNSLDTN in ("1", "2", "3", "4"))]

/*The variable Type of prudential consolidation (TYP_PRDNTL_CNSLDTN) in the cube / data set Scope of the group: “entity-by-entity” - Reference (unfolded) (F_40_01_REF_UNFLDD) is restricted to the values 'Full consolidation (1)', 'Proportional consolidation (2)', 'Equity method (3)', 'Other than Full consolidation, Proportional consolidation, Equity method (4)'*/F_40_01_REF_UNFLDD := F_40_01_REF_UNFLDD [filter(TYP_PRDNTL_CNSLDTN in ("1", "2", "3", "4"))]

/*The (non-reference) cube F_40_02 is related to the (reference) cube F_40_02_REF via the mappings (see table CUBE_MAPPING) in the data base. To be more precise the relationship between a non-reference cube and a reference cube may be established via the inverse of the mappings (due to the fact that our mappings describe the relationship from non-reference to reference cubes)*/F_40_02 := APPLY_INVERSE_MAPPINGS(F_40_02_REF)
/*Finally we add the (non-reference) variable Unit (Unit) (that is specified as an input parameter in the cube Parameters)*/F_40_02 := F_40_02 [calc CNSTNT_Unit as "Unit" role Identifier]

/*Selection of all Equity instruments where the owner is an entity present in the Accounting group*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_GRP_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_DBTRS_FINREP [filter(OBSRVD_AGNT_INTRNL_ID in (CNSLDTD_ENTTS_ACCNTNG_LST))];

/*Selection of all Equity instruments where the Issuer identifier is an entity present in the Accounting group*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_GRP_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_GRP_FINREP [filter(ISSR_ID in (CNSLDTD_ENTTS_ACCNTNG_LST))];

/*Apply the individual perspective based on the accounting framework of the group*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_GRP_INDVDL_FINREP := [EQTY_INSTRMNTS_GRP_FINREP as "A", PRDNTL_NT_FLL_PRPTNL_CNSLDT_PRSPCTV_IDS as "B" on A.ISSR_ID = B.PRSPCTV_ID];

/*Select all equity instruments where the owner of the security is not an entity that is in the prudential scope of consolidation but that is not fully or partially consolidated*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_GRP_GRP_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_GRP_FINREP [filter(OBSRVD_AGNT_INTRNL_ID not in (CNSLDTD_ENTTS_PRDTNL_SUB_LST))];
/*Apply the group perspective*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_GRP_GRP_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_GRP_GRP_FINREP[filter(PRSPCTV_ID = CNSTNT_GRP_ACCNTNG_ID)];
EQTY_INSTRMNTS_GRP_FINREP := union (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_GRP_GRP_FINREP, EQTY_INSTRMNTS_GRP_INDVDL_FINREP);
F_40_02_REF_UNFLDD := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_GRP_FINREP;

/*The cube / data set Scope of the group: "instrument-by-instrument" - Reference (unfolded) (F_40_02_REF_UNFLDD) is restricted to the variabes Perspective identifier (PRSPCTV_ID), Accumulated equity interest (ACCMLTD_EQT_INTRST), Acquisition cost (ACQSTN_CST), Carrying amount (CRRYNG_AMNT), Reference date (DT_RFRNC), Entity code (ENTTY_CD), Holding company LEI code (HLDNG_CMPNY_LEI), Holding company code (HLDNG_ENTTY_CD), Name of Holding entity (HLDNG_ENTTY_NM), Observed agent internal identifier (OBSRVD_AGNT_INTRNL_ID), Identifier value (SCRTY_ID), Type of accounting item (TYP_ACCNTNG_ITM), Type of instrument (TYP_INSTRMNT)*/F_40_02_REF_UNFLDD := F_40_02_REF_UNFLDD [keep(DT_RFRNC role Identifier, PRSPCTV_ID role Identifier, HLDNG_ENTTY_CD role Identifier, OBSRVD_AGNT_INTRNL_ID role Identifier, SCRTY_ID role Identifier, TYP_ACCNTNG_ITM role Identifier, TYP_INSTRMNT role Identifier, ACCMLTD_EQT_INTRST role Measure, ACQSTN_CST role Measure, CRRYNG_AMNT role Measure, ENTTY_CD role Measure, HLDNG_CMPNY_LEI role Measure, HLDNG_ENTTY_NM role Measure)]

/*Exclusion of all Equity instruments where the Issuer identifier equal to the Institution identifier; i.e. exclusion of treasury shares*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_GRP_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_GRP_FINREP [filter(ISSR_ID not in (CNSTNT_INSTTTN_ID))];

/*Selection of all Equity instruments where the Issuer identifier is an entity that is classified as 'Subsidiaries (3)', 'Associates (4)' or 'Joint ventures (9)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_GRP_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_GRP_FINREP [filter(ISSR_ID in (JNT_VNTRS_SBSDRS_ENTTS_FINREP_LST))];
/*Selection of all Equity instruments in the form of 'Shares (220)' or 'Other equity (230)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_GRP_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_GRP_FINREP [filter(TYP_INSTRMNT in ("220", "230"))];

/*Selection of all Equity instruments that are classified as 'IFRS: Financial assets held for trading (2)', 'IFRS: Financial assets at fair value through other comprehensive income (8)' or 'IFRS: Non-trading financial assets mandatorily at fair value through profit or loss (41)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_GRP_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_GRP_FINREP [filter(ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN in ("2", "8", 41))];

/*Selection of all entities that are part of the prudential scope that are not fully or proportionally consolidated (i.e. Consolidation method (CNSLDTN_MTHD) either 'Equity method (3)' or 'Other than Full consolidation, Proportional consolidation, Equity method (4)'*/CNSLDTD_ENTTS_PRDTNL_SUB := CNSLDTD_ENTTS_PRDTNL [filter(CNSLDTN_MTHD in ("3", "4"))];

/*Create a list comprising all entities that are part of the prudential scope but not fully or proportionally consolidated*/CNSLDTD_ENTTS_PRDTNL_SUB_LST := CNSLDTD_ENTTS_PRDTNL_SUB [keep(LGL_ENTTY_ID)];

/*The variable Hedged or hedging instrument (HDG_INSTRMNT) is set to 'Not applicable (0)'*/INVSTMNT_PRPRTY_FINREP := INVSTMNT_PRPRTY_FINREP [calc "0" as "HDG_INSTRMNT"]
