/*The variable Position at Nominal Value in EUR (NMNL_VL) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "NMNL_VL"];

/*The variable Risk-weight (RSK_WGHT) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "RSK_WGHT"];

/*The variable Subordinated debt (SBRDNTD_DBT) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'Non-subordinated debt (2)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "2" as "SBRDNTD_DBT"];

/*The variable Collateral geographical location (CLLTRL_LCTN) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'Not applicable (0)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "0" as "CLLTRL_LCTN"];

/*The variable ISIN code (ISIN) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "ISIN"];

/*The variable Specific risk weight (SPCFC_RSK_WGHT) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "SPCFC_RSK_WGHT"];

/*The variable Number of units or aggregated nominal value (UNT_MSR_NV) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "UNT_MSR_NV"];

/*The variable Is equity with 250% risk weight (IS_EQTY_250_RSK_WGHT) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'FALSE (F)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "F" as "IS_EQTY_250_RSK_WGHT"];

/*The variable Is qualifying holding with 1250% risk weight (IS_QLFY_HLD_1250_RSK_WGHT) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'FALSE (F)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "F" as "IS_QLFY_HLD_1250_RSK_WGHT"];

/*The variable Cumulative recoveries since default (CMLTV_RCVRS_SNC_DFLT) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "CMLTV_RCVRS_SNC_DFLT"];

/*The variable Status of the security, whether the instrument is active and not active (SCRTY_STTS) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'Not applicable (0)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "0" as "SCRTY_STTS"];

/*The variable Relationship with securitisation or credit transfer (RLTNSHP_SCRTSTN_CRDT_TRNSFR) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'Not applicable (no relationship) (0)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "0" as "RLTNSHP_SCRTSTN_CRDT_TRNSFR"];

/*The variable Is covered bond (IS_CVRD_BND) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'FALSE (F)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "F" as "IS_CVRD_BND"];

/*The variable Security Guarantee level (SCRTY_GRNT_LVL) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'Unguaranteed  (1)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "1" as "SCRTY_GRNT_LVL"];

/*The variable Approach for prudential purposes (APPRCH_PRDNTL_PRPSS) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'Not applicable (0)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "0" as "APPRCH_PRDNTL_PRPSS"];

/*The variable Security level (SCRTY_LVL) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'Unsecured (1)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "1" as "SCRTY_LVL"];

/*The variable Date of the collateral obtained by taking possession (CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN_DT) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN_DT"];

/*The variable Issue date (DT_ISS) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "DT_ISS"];

/*The variable Is non-performing prior to forbearance (IS_NN_PRFRMNG_PRR_FRBRNC) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'FALSE (F)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "F" as "IS_NN_PRFRMNG_PRR_FRBRNC"];

/*The variable Identifier value (SCRTY_ID) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "SCRTY_ID"];

/*The variable Forbearance and renegotiation status (FRBRNC_STTS) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'Not applicable (0)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "0" as "FRBRNC_STTS"];

/*The variable Prudential portfolio (PRDNTL_PRTFL) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'Not applicable (0)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "0" as "PRDNTL_PRTFL"];

/*The variable Is particular high risk (IS_PRTCLR_HGH_RSK) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'FALSE (F)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "F" as "IS_PRTCLR_HGH_RSK"];

/*The variable Fair value changes (FV_CHNG) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "FV_CHNG"];

/*The variable Position at market value in Euro (MRKT_VL) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "MRKT_VL"];

/*The variable Original securitisation identifier (ORGNL_SCRTSTN_ID) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "ORGNL_SCRTSTN_ID"];

/*The variable Security status date (DT_SCRTY_STTS) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "DT_SCRTY_STTS"];

/*The variable Accumulated equity interest (%)  (ACCMLTD_EQTY_INTRST) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "ACCMLTD_EQTY_INTRST"];

/*The variable Security rank level (SCRTY_RNK_LVL) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'Subordinated - No further breakdown available (3)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "3" as "SCRTY_RNK_LVL"];

/*The variable Type of product (TYP_PRDCT) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'Not applicable (0)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "0" as "TYP_PRDCT"];

/*The variable Total extinguishment of all the reporting institution's rights (IS_TTL_EXTNGSHMNT) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'FALSE (F)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "F" as "IS_TTL_EXTNGSHMNT"];

/*The variable Gross carrying amount excluding accrued interest (GRSS_CRRYNG_AMNT_E_INTRST) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "GRSS_CRRYNG_AMNT_E_INTRST"];

/*The variable Total amount of capital issued  (TTL_AMNT_CPTL_ISSD) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "TTL_AMNT_CPTL_ISSD"];

/*The variable Impairment assessment method (IMPRMNT_ASSSSMNT_MTHD) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'Not applicable (0)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "0" as "IMPRMNT_ASSSSMNT_MTHD"];

/*The variable Source of encumbrance (SRC_ENCMBRNC) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'Not applicable (0)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "0" as "SRC_ENCMBRNC"];

/*The variable Is equity holding with 370% risk weight (IS_EQTY_HLD_370_RSK_WGHT) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'FALSE (F)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "F" as "IS_EQTY_HLD_370_RSK_WGHT"];

/*The variable Owned Security identifier (OWND_SCRTY_ID) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "OWND_SCRTY_ID"];

/*The variable Exposure class (EXPSR_CLSS) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'Not applicable (0)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "0" as "EXPSR_CLSS"];

/*The variable Loss given default (LGD) in downturns (LGD_DWNTRNS) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "LGD_DWNTRNS"];

/*The variable Instrument type (PRMRY_ASST_CLSSFCTN) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'Not applicable (0)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "0" as "PRMRY_ASST_CLSSFCTN"];

/*The variable Collateral obtained by taking possession (CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'False (F)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "F" as "CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN"];

/*The variable Observed agent internal identifier (OBSRVD_AGNT_INTRNL_ID) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "OBSRVD_AGNT_INTRNL_ID"];

/*The variable Acquisition cost (ACQSTN_CST) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "ACQSTN_CST"];

/*The variable Total number of shares issued  (TTL_NR_SHR_ISSD) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "TTL_NR_SHR_ISSD"];

/*The variable Exposure Value (EXPSR_VL) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "EXPSR_VL"];

/*The variable Is short position (IS_SHRT_PSTN) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'FALSE (F)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "F" as "IS_SHRT_PSTN"];

/*The variable Listed (IS_LSTD) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'FALSE (F)'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc "F" as "IS_LSTD"];

/*The variable External credit assessment (EXTRNL_CRDT_ASSSSMNT) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "EXTRNL_CRDT_ASSSSMNT"];

/*The variable Date of past due (DT_PST_D) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "DT_PST_D"];

/*The variable Loss given default (LGD) in normal economic times (LGD_NRML) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "LGD_NRML"];

/*The variable Accrued interest (accounting) (ACCRD_INTRST) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "ACCRD_INTRST"];
/*Renaming Counterparty identifier (CNTRPRTY_ID) into Issuer identifier (ISSR_ID)*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [rename CNTRPRTY_ID as "ISSR_ID"];

/*Renaming Instrument unique identifier (INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID) into Owned security identifier (OWND_SCRTY_ID)*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [rename INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID as "OWND_SCRTY_ID"];

/*The variable Date of forbearance and renegotiation status (DT_FRBRNC_STTS) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "DT_FRBRNC_STTS"];

/*The variable Guarantor ID (GRNTR_ID) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "GRNTR_ID"];

/*The variable Maturity date (DT_MTRTY) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "DT_MTRTY"];

/*The variable Arrears for the instrument (ARRRS) for Equity instruments that are not securities (EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP) is by default 'null'*/EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_FINREP [calc null as "ARRRS"];
EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_DBTRS_E := [EQTY_INSTRMNTS_NT_SCRTS_E as "A", CNTRPRTS_E as "B" on CNTRPRTY_ID];
EQTY_INSTRMNTS_SCRTS_DBTRS_E := [EQTY_SCRTS_E as "A", CNTRPRTS_E as "B" on A.ISSR = B.CNTRPRTY_ID];

/*Selection of Equity instrument (in the form of securities) via the variables Type of instrument (TYP_INSTRMNT) and Is short position (IS_SHRT_PSTN)*/EQTY_SCRTS_E := OWND_SCRTS_E [filter(TYP_INSTRMNT in ("220", "240") and IS_SHRT_PSTN in ("F", "0"))];
/*Filter for Equity instruments*/SHR_CPTL_INVST_CNTRPRTY_FINREP := RGSTRY_TBL_SCRTS [filter(TYP_INSTRMNT in (TYP_INSTRMNT_11))];

/*Generate a cube structure like {Issuer identifier, Total amount of capital issued, Type of instrument}*/SHR_CPTL_INVST_CNTRPRTY_FINREP := SHR_CPTL_INVST_CNTRPRTY_FINREP [keep(ISSR_ID role Identifier, TTL_AMNT_CPTL_ISSD, TYP_INSTRMNT)];

/*Selection of Property, plant and equipment that was taken into possession in the interval between the start of the accounting year (T0) and the current reference date (T_CRRNT)*/PRPRTY_PLNT_EQPMNT_CLLTRL_OBTND := PRPRTY_PLNT_EQPMNT_FINREP [filter(CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN = "T" and CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN_DT > T0 and CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN_DT < T_CRRNT)];
PRPRTY_PLNT_EQPMNT_CLLTRL_OBTND := PRPRTY_PLNT_EQPMNT_CLLTRL_OBTND [keep(DT_RFRNC, IS_HFS, OBSRVD_AGNT_INTRNL_ID, TYP_ACCNTNG_ITM, TYP_INSTRMNT, CRRYNG_AMNT as "CRRYNG_AMNT_CLLTRL_OBTND_PRD")];

/*Selection of Loans and advances that were taken into possession in the interval between the start of the accounting year (T0) and the current reference date (T_CRRNT)*/LNS_ADVNCS_CCLLTRL_OBTND := LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP [filter(CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN = "T" and CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN_DT > T0 and CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN_DT < T_CRRNT)];
LNS_ADVNCS_CCLLTRL_OBTND := LNS_ADVNCS_CCLLTRL_OBTND [keep(DT_RFRNC, IS_HFS, OBSRVD_AGNT_INTRNL_ID, TYP_ACCNTNG_ITM, TYP_INSTRMNT, CRRYNG_AMNT as "CRRYNG_AMNT_CLLTRL_OBTND_PRD")]

/*Selection of other assets that were taken into possession in the interval between the start of the accounting year (T0) and the current reference date (T_CRRNT)*/OTHR_CLLTRL_OBTND := OTHR_ASSTS_FINREP [filter(CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN = "T" and CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN_DT > T0 and CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN_DT < T_CRRNT)];
OTHR_CLLTRL_OBTND := OTHR_CLLTRL_OBTND [keep(DT_RFRNC, IS_HFS, OBSRVD_AGNT_INTRNL_ID, TYP_ACCNTNG_ITM, TYP_INSTRMNT, CRRYNG_AMNT as "CRRYNG_AMNT_CLLTRL_OBTND_PRD")]

/*Selection of Investment property that was taken into possession in the interval between the start of the accounting year (T0) and the current reference date (T_CRRNT)*/INVSTMNT_PRPRTY_CLLTRL_OBTND := INVSTMNT_PRPRTY_FINREP [filter(CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN = "T" and CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN_DT > T0 and CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN_DT < T_CRRNT)];
INVSTMNT_PRPRTY_CLLTRL_OBTND := INVSTMNT_PRPRTY_CLLTRL_OBTND [keep(DT_RFRNC, IS_HFS, OBSRVD_AGNT_INTRNL_ID, TYP_ACCNTNG_ITM, TYP_INSTRMNT, CRRYNG_AMNT as "CRRYNG_AMNT_CLLTRL_OBTND_PRD")];

/*Selection of Held-for-sale assets that were taken into possession in the interval between the start of the accounting year (T0) and the current reference date (T_CRRNT)*/HFS_ASSTS_CLLTRL_OBTND := HFS_ASSTS_FINREP [filter(CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN = "T" and CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN_DT > T0 and CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN_DT < T_CRRNT)];
HFS_ASSTS_CLLTRL_OBTND := HFS_ASSTS_CLLTRL_OBTND [keep(DT_RFRNC, IS_HFS, OBSRVD_AGNT_INTRNL_ID, TYP_ACCNTNG_ITM, TYP_INSTRMNT, CRRYNG_AMNT as "CRRYNG_AMNT_CLLTRL_OBTND_PRD")];

/*Selection of Equity instruments that were taken into possession in the interval between the start of the accounting year (T0) and the current reference date (T_CRRNT)*/EQYT_INSTRMNTS_CLLTRL_OBTND := EQTY_INSTRMNTS_DBTRS_FINREP [filter(CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN = "T" and CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN_DT > T0 and CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN_DT < T_CRRNT)];
EQYT_INSTRMNTS_CLLTRL_OBTND := EQYT_INSTRMNTS_CLLTRL_OBTND [keep(DT_RFRNC, IS_HFS, OBSRVD_AGNT_INTRNL_ID, TYP_ACCNTNG_ITM, TYP_INSTRMNT, CRRYNG_AMNT as "CRRYNG_AMNT_CLLTRL_OBTND_PRD")];

/*Selection of Debt securities that were taken into possession in the interval between the start of the accounting year (T0) and the current reference date (T_CRRNT)*/DBT_SCRTS_CLLTRL_OBTND := DBT_SCRTS_DBTRS_FINREP [filter(CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN = "T" and CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN_DT > T0 and CLLTRL_OBTND_TKNG_PSSSSN_DT < T_CRRNT)];
DBT_SCRTS_CLLTRL_OBTND := DBT_SCRTS_CLLTRL_OBTND [keep(DT_RFRNC, IS_HFS, OBSRVD_AGNT_INTRNL_ID, TYP_ACCNTNG_ITM, TYP_INSTRMNT, CRRYNG_AMNT as "CRRYNG_AMNT_CLLTRL_OBTND_PRD")];
/*Selection of 'Subsidiaries (3)', 'Associates (4)' and 'Joint ventures (9)'*/JNT_VNTRS_SBSDRS_ENTTS_FINREP := CNSLDTD_ENTTS_ACCNTNG[filter(GRP_STRCTR_RLTNSHP in ("3", "4", "9"))];

/*Add the information of the cube Counterparties (FinRep) (CNTRPRTS_FINREP)*/JNT_VNTRS_SBSDRS_ENTTS_FINREP := [JNT_VNTRS_SBSDRS_ENTTS_FINREP as "A", CNTRPRTS_FINREP as "B" on A.LGL_ENTTY_ID = B.CNTRPRTY_ID];

/*Add the Total amount of capital issued (TTL_AMNT_CPTL_ISSD) per counterparty*/JNT_VNTRS_SBSDRS_ENTTS_FINREP := [JNT_VNTRS_SBSDRS_ENTTS_FINREP as "A", SHR_CPTL_INVST_CNTRPRTY_FINREP as "B" on A.LGL_ENTTY_ID = B.ISSR_ID];

/*Adding the Type of accounting consolidation (TYP_ACCNTNG_CNSLDTN) and the Type of prudential consolidation (TYP_PRDNTL_CNSLDTN) for each entity*/JNT_VNTRS_SBSDRS_ENTTS_FINREP := [JNT_VNTRS_SBSDRS_ENTTS_FINREP as "A", TYP_CNSLDTN_CNTRPRTY_FINREP as "B" on LGL_ENTTY_ID];
/*We simply copy the content of the cube Factoring auxiliary (FCTRNG_AXLRY)*/FCTRNG_AXLRY_E := FCTRNG_AXLRY;

/*Selection of those protections that are considered financial guarantees (i.e. 'Financial guarantees other than credit derivatives (5)' and 'Credit derivatives meeting the definition of financial guarantees (41)')*/FNNCL_GRNTS_RCVD_FINREP := PRTCTNS_RCVD_FINREP[filter(TYP_PRTCTN in ("5", "41"))];

/*Join with the Protection-protection providers - enriched (PRTCTNS_PRTCTN_PRVDRS_E) in order to extract the counterparty*/FNNCL_GRNTS_RCVD_FINREP := [FNNCL_GRNTS_RCVD_FINREP as "A", PRTCTNS_PRTCTN_PRVDRS_E as "B" on PRTCTN_ID];

/*Join with the Counterparties (FinRep) (CNTRPRTS_FINREP) in order to extract counterparty related information (e.g. Institutional sector)*/FNNCL_GRNTS_RCVD_FINREP := [FNNCL_GRNTS_RCVD_FINREP as "A", CNTRPRTS_FINREP as "B" on CNTRPRTY_ID];
/*Set the Nominal amount to 'null'*/FNNCL_GRNTS_RCVD_FINREP := FNNCL_GRNTS_RCVD_FINREP [calc null as "NMNL_AMNT"]

/*The Type of instrument (TYP_INSTRMNT) for Financial guarantees received (FinRep) (FNNCL_GRNTS_RCVD_FINREP) is by default 'Financial guarantees received (960)'*/FNNCL_GRNTS_RCVD_FINREP := FNNCL_GRNTS_RCVD_FINREP [calc "960" as "TYP_INSTRMNT"]

/*The Type of accounting item (TYP_ACCNTNG_ITM) for Financial guarantees received (FinRep) (FNNCL_GRNTS_RCVD_FINREP) is by default 'Off-balance sheet items (988)'*/FNNCL_GRNTS_RCVD_FINREP := FNNCL_GRNTS_RCVD_FINREP [calc "988" as "TYP_ACCNTNG_ITM"]
FNNCL_GRNTS_RCVD_FINREP := FNNCL_GRNTS_RCVD_FINREP [calc FNNCL_GRNT_CNSDRD_MX_AMNT as "NMNL_VL_MX_CLLTRL_GRNT_CNSDRD"]

FNNCL_GRNTS_RCVD_FINREP := FNNCL_GRNTS_RCVD_FINREP [keep(DT_RFRNC role Identifier, INSTTTNL_SCTR role Identifier, OBSRVD_AGNT_INTRNL_ID role Identifier, TYP_ACCNTNG_ITM role Identifier, TYP_INSTRMNT role Identifier, NMNL_AMNT role Measure, NMNL_VL_MX_CLLTRL_GRNT_CNSDRD role Measure)];
GDWLL_E := GDWLL;
/*The variable Accounting classification (ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN) is set to 'Not applicable (0)'*/GDWLL_FINREP := GDWLL_E [calc "0" as "ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN"]

/*The variable Repayment rights (RPYMNT_RGHTS) is set to 'Not applicable (0)'*/GDWLL_FINREP := GDWLL_FINREP [calc "0" as "RPYMNT_RGHTS"]
/*The variable Type of accounting item (TYP_ACCNTNG_ITM) is set to 'Intangible assets. Goodwill (420)'*/GDWLL_FINREP := GDWLL_FINREP [calc "420" as "TYP_ACCNTNG_ITM"]
/*The variable Type of hedge (TYP_HDG) is set to 'Not applicable (0)'*/GDWLL_FINREP := GDWLL_FINREP [calc "0" as "TYP_HDG"]
/*The variable Type of instrument (TYP_INSTRMNT) is set to 'Not applicable (0)'*/GDWLL_FINREP := GDWLL_FINREP [calc "0" as "TYP_INSTRMNT"]
GRP_E := GRP;
GRP_FINREP := GRP_E;

/*Create a list of Counterparty identifiers (LGL_ENTTY_ID) that contains all entities that are part of the Accountign group and that are considered as 'Subsidiaries (3)', 'Associates (4)' or 'Joint ventures (9)'*/JNT_VNTRS_SBSDRS_ENTTS_FINREP_LST := JNT_VNTRS_SBSDRS_ENTTS_FINREP [keep(LGL_ENTTY_ID)];

/*The variable Is serviced by the observed agent (IS_SRVCD_OBSRVD_AGNT) for Advances (that are not loans) (ADVNCS_NT_LNS) is by default 'TRUE (T)'*/ADVNCS_NT_LNS_E := ADVNCS_NT_LNS [calc "T" as "IS_SRVCD_OBSRVD_AGNT"];

/*The variable Next interest rate reset date (DT_NXT_INTRST_RT_RST) for Advances (that are not loans) (ADVNCS_NT_LNS) is by default 'null'*/ADVNCS_NT_LNS_E := ADVNCS_NT_LNS_E [calc null as "DT_NXT_INTRST_RT_RST"];
/*The variable Is debt financing (IS_DBT_FNNCNG) for Advances (that are not loans) (ADVNCS_NT_LNS) is by default 'FALSE (F)'*/ADVNCS_NT_LNS_E := ADVNCS_NT_LNS_E [calc "F" as "IS_DBT_FNNCNG"];

/*The variable Relationship with securitisation or credit transfer (RLTNSHP_SCRTSTN_CRDT_TRNSFR) for Advances (that are not loans) (ADVNCS_NT_LNS) is by default 'Not applicable (no relationship) (0)'*/ADVNCS_NT_LNS_E := ADVNCS_NT_LNS_E [calc "0" as "RLTNSHP_SCRTSTN_CRDT_TRNSFR"];

/*The variable Purchased or originated credit impaired financial assets (PRCHSD_ORGNTD_CRDT_IMPRD) for Advances (that are not loans) (ADVNCS_NT_LNS) is by default 'No (0)'*/ADVNCS_NT_LNS_E := ADVNCS_NT_LNS_E [calc "0" as "PRCHSD_ORGNTD_CRDT_IMPRD"];

/*The variable Legal final maturity date (DT_LGL_FNL_MTRTY) for Advances (that are not loans) (ADVNCS_NT_LNS) is by default 'null'*/ADVNCS_NT_LNS_E := ADVNCS_NT_LNS_E [calc null as "DT_LGL_FNL_MTRTY"];
/*The variable Fiduciary instrument (FDCRY) for Advances (that are not loans) (ADVNCS_NT_LNS) is by default 'Non-fiduciary instrument (2)'*/ADVNCS_NT_LNS_E := ADVNCS_NT_LNS_E [calc "2" as "FDCRY"];

/*The variable Interest rate floor (INTRST_RT_FLR) for Advances (that are not loans) (ADVNCS_NT_LNS) is by default 'null'*/ADVNCS_NT_LNS_E := ADVNCS_NT_LNS_E [calc null as "INTRST_RT_FLR"];

/*The variable Interest rate (ANNLSD_AGRD_RT) for Advances (that are not loans) (ADVNCS_NT_LNS) is by default 'null'*/ADVNCS_NT_LNS_E := ADVNCS_NT_LNS_E [calc null as "ANNLSD_AGRD_RT"];

/*The variable Repayment rights (RPYMNT_RGHTS) for Other trade receivables (OTHR_TRD_RCVBLS) is by default 'Other than on demand or short notice (2)'*/OTHR_TRD_RCVBLS_E := OTHR_TRD_RCVBLS [calc "2" as "RPYMNT_RGHTS"]

/*The variable Project finance loan (PRJCT_FNNC_LN) for Other trade receivables (OTHR_TRD_RCVBLS) is by default 'Not applicable (0)'*/OTHR_TRD_RCVBLS_E := OTHR_TRD_RCVBLS_E [calc "0" as "PRJCT_FNNC_LN"]

/*The variable Is transferable deposit (IS_TRNSFRBL_DPST) for Other trade receivables (OTHR_TRD_RCVBLS) is by default 'FALSE (F)'*/OTHR_TRD_RCVBLS_E := OTHR_TRD_RCVBLS_E [calc "F" as "IS_TRNSFRBL_DPST"]

/*The variable Subordinated debt (SBRDNTD_DBT) for Other trade receivables (OTHR_TRD_RCVBLS) is by default 'Non-subordinated debt (2)'*/OTHR_TRD_RCVBLS_E := OTHR_TRD_RCVBLS_E [calc "2" as "SBRDNTD_DBT"]
/*The variable Freezing period in days (FRZNG_PRD_DYS) for Other trade receivables (OTHR_TRD_RCVBLS) is by default '0'*/OTHR_TRD_RCVBLS_E := OTHR_TRD_RCVBLS_E [calc 0 as "FRZNG_PRD_DYS"]

/*The variable Type of instrument (TYP_INSTRMNT) for Other trade receivables (OTHR_TRD_RCVBLS) is by default 'Other trade receivables (1023)'*/OTHR_TRD_RCVBLS_E := OTHR_TRD_RCVBLS_E [calc "1023" as "TYP_INSTRMNT"];
/*The variable Is redeemable at notice (IS_RDMBL_NTC) for Repurchase agreements (RPRCHS_AGRMNT) is by default 'FALSE (F)'*/RPRCHS_AGRMNT_E := RPRCHS_AGRMNT [calc "F" as "IS_RDMBL_NTC"];
/*The variable Subordinated debt (SBRDNTD_DBT) for Repurchase agreements (RPRCHS_AGRMNT) is by default 'Non-subordinated debt (2)'*/RPRCHS_AGRMNT_E := RPRCHS_AGRMNT_E [calc "2" as "SBRDNTD_DBT"];

/*The variableType of instrument (TYP_INSTRMNT) for Repurchase agreements (RPRCHS_AGRMNT) is by default 'Repurchase agreements (300)'*/RPRCHS_AGRMNT_E := RPRCHS_AGRMNT_E [calc "300" as "TYP_INSTRMNT"];

/*The variable Purpose (PRPS) for Reverse repurchase loans (RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS) is dependent on  the value of the variable Is debt financing (IS_DBT_FNNCNG)*/RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E := RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS [calc if (IS_DBT_FNNCNG = "T") then "5" else "11" as "PRPS"]
/*The variable Type of amortisation (TYP_AMRTSTN) for Reverse repurchase loans (RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS) is by default 'Bullet (4)'*/RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E := RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E [calc "4" as "TYP_AMRTSTN"]
/*The variable Is revolving loan (IS_RVLVNG_LN) for Reverse repurchase loans (RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS) is by default 'FALSE (F)'*/RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E := RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E [calc "F" as "IS_RVLVNG_LN"]
/*The variable Freezing period in days (FRZNG_PRD_DYS) for Reverse repurchase loans (RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS) is by default '0'*/RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E := RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E [calc 0 as "FRZNG_PRD_DYS"]

/*The variable Type of instrument (TYP_INSTRMNT) for Reverse repurchase loans (RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS) is by default 'Reverse repurchase loans (090)'*/RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E := RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E [calc "090" as "TYP_INSTRMNT"];

/*The variable Is credit line other than revolving credit (IS_CRDT_LN_OTHR_RV_CRDT) for Reverse repurchase loans (RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS) is by default 'FALSE (F)'*/RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E := RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E [calc "F" as "IS_CRDT_LN_OTHR_RV_CRDT"]
/*The variable Payment frequency (PYMNT_FRQNCY) for Reverse repurchase loans (RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS) is by default 'Bullet (4)'*/RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E := RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E [calc "4" as "PYMNT_FRQNCY"]

/*The variable Repayment rights (RPYMNT_RGHTS) for Reverse repurchase loans (RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS) is by default 'Other than on demand or short notice (2)'*/RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E := RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E [calc "2" as "RPYMNT_RGHTS"]

/*The variable Purchased or originated credit impaired financial assets (PRCHSD_ORGNTD_CRDT_IMPRD) for Reverse repurchase loans (RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS) is by default 'No (0)'*/RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E := RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E [calc "0" as "PRCHSD_ORGNTD_CRDT_IMPRD"]

/*The variable Project finance loan (PRJCT_FNNC_LN) for Reverse repurchase loans (RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS) is by default 'Not applicable (0)'*/RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E := RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E [calc "0" as "PRJCT_FNNC_LN"]

/*The variable Is transferable deposit (IS_TRNSFRBL_DPST) for Reverse repurchase loans (RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS) is by default 'FALSE (F)'*/RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E := RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E [calc "F" as "IS_TRNSFRBL_DPST"]

/*The variable End date of the interest-only period (DT_END_INTRST_ONLY) for Reverse repurchase loans (RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS) is by default 'null'*/RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E := RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E [calc null as "DT_END_INTRST_ONLY"]

/*The variable Subordinated debt (SBRDNTD_DBT) for Reverse repurchase loans (RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS) is by default 'Non-subordinated debt (2)'*/RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E := RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E [calc "2" as "SBRDNTD_DBT"]

/*The relations between Instruments and counterparties that are beneficiaries is extracted from the cue Transactions-counterparties (TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS) where the Type of transaction (TYP_TRNSCTN) is 'Loan/Deposit (1)' and the Counterparty role in a transaction (CNTRPRTY_RL) is 'Beneficiary (6)'*/INSTRMNTS_BNFCRS_E := TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS [filter(TYP_TRNSCTN in ("1") and CNTRPRTY_RL in ("6"))];
/*Keeping only relevant variables*/INSTRMNTS_BNFCRS_E := INSTRMNTS_BNFCRS_E [keep(TRNSCTN_ID as "INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID", CNTRPRTY_ID)];

/*The relations between Instruments and counterparties that are creditors is extracted from the cue Transactions-counterparties (TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS) where the Type of transaction (TYP_TRNSCTN) is 'Loan/Deposit (1)' and the Counterparty role in a transaction (CNTRPRTY_RL) is 'Creditor (1)'*/INSTRMNTS_CRDTRS_E := TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS [filter(TYP_TRNSCTN in ("1") and CNTRPRTY_RL in ("1"))];
/*Keeping only relevant variables*/INSTRMNTS_CRDTRS_E := INSTRMNTS_CRDTRS_E [keep(TRNSCTN_ID as "INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID", CNTRPRTY_ID)];

/*The relations between Instruments and counterparties that are customers is extracted from the cue Transactions-counterparties (TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS) where the Type of transaction (TYP_TRNSCTN) is 'Loan/Deposit (1)' and the Counterparty role in a transaction (CNTRPRTY_RL) is 'Customer (8)'*/INSTRMNTS_CSTMRS_E := TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS [filter(TYP_TRNSCTN in ("1") and CNTRPRTY_RL in ("8"))];
/*Keeping only relevant variables*/INSTRMNTS_CSTMRS_E := INSTRMNTS_CSTMRS_E [keep(TRNSCTN_ID as "INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID", CNTRPRTY_ID, JNT_LBLTY, JNT_LBLTY_AMNT)];
/*Rename the variable Counterparty identifier (CNTRPRTY_ID) into Originator identifier (SRVCR_ID)*/INSTRMNTS_ORGNTR_FINREP := INSTRMNTS_ORGNTRS_E [rename CNTRPRTY_ID as "ORGNTR_ID"];
/*Selection of instruments and related originators*/INSTRMNTS_ORGNTRS_E := TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS [filter(TYP_TRNSCTN in ("1") and CNTRPRTY_RL in ("4"))];
/*Keeping only relevant variables*/INSTRMNTS_ORGNTRS_E := INSTRMNTS_ORGNTRS_E [keep(TRNSCTN_ID as "INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID", CNTRPRTY_ID)];
INSTRMNTS_PRTCTNS_E := INSTRMNTS_PRTCTNS;

/*The relations between Instruments and counterparties that are servicers is extracted from the cue Transactions-counterparties (TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS) where the Type of transaction (TYP_TRNSCTN) is 'Loan/Deposit (1)' and the Counterparty role in a transaction (CNTRPRTY_RL) is 'Servicer (7)'*/INSTRMNTS_SRVCRS_E := TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS [filter(TYP_TRNSCTN in ("1") and CNTRPRTY_RL in ("7"))];
/*Keeping only relevant variables*/INSTRMNTS_SRVCRS_E := INSTRMNTS_SRVCRS_E [keep(TRNSCTN_ID as "INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID", CNTRPRTY_ID)];
/*Extraction of all loans where the observed agent is the servicer*/INSTRMNTS_SRVCRS_ADDTNL := LNS_E [filter(IS_SRVCD_OBSRVD_AGNT = "T")];
/*Set the Observed agent identifier (OBSRVD_AGNT_ID) as the Counterparty identifier (CNTRPRTY_ID)*/INSTRMNTS_SRVCRS_ADDTNL := INSTRMNTS_SRVCRS_ADDTNL [calc OBSRVD_AGNT_ID as "CNTRPRTY_ID"];

/*Reduce the variables in order to match the structure of the cube Instruments-servicers - enriched (INSTRMNTS_SRVCRS_E)*/INSTRMNTS_SRVCRS_ADDTNL := INSTRMNTS_SRVCRS_ADDTNL [keep(INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID, CNTRPRTY_ID)];
INSTRMNTS_SRVCRS_E := union(INSTRMNTS_SRVCRS_E, INSTRMNTS_SRVCRS_ADDTNL);
/*Rename the variable Counterparty identifier (CNTRPRTY_ID) into Servicer identifier (SRVCR_ID)*/INSTRMNTS_SRVCRS_FINREP := INSTRMNTS_SRVCRS_E [rename CNTRPRTY_ID as "SRVCR_ID"];
LNS_E_T0 := LNS_E [filter(DT_RFRNC = T0)];
CNTRPRTS_E_T0 := CNTRPRTS_E [filter(DT_RFRNC = T0)];
LNS_E_T_PRVS_2 := LNS_E [filter(DT_RFRNC = T_PRVS_2)];
CNTRPRTS_E_T_PRVS_2 := CNTRPRTS_E [filter(DT_RFRNC = T_PRVS_2)];
INSTRMNTS_CSTMRS_E_T_PRVS_2 := INSTRMNTS_CSTMRS_E [filter(DT_RFRNC = T_PRVS_2)];
INSTRMNTS_CRDTRS_E_T_PRVS_2 := INSTRMNTS_CRDTRS_E [filter(DT_RFRNC = T_PRVS_2)];
call CHCK_AC_RPRTNG_RQRMNTS(LNS_E_T_PRVS_2, INSTRMNTS_CSTMRS_E_T_PRVS_2, INSTRMNTS_CRDTRS_E_T_PRVS_2, CNTRPRTS_E_T_PRVS_2, TB_RPRTD_T_PRVS_2, INSTRMNTS_TB_RPRTD_T_PRVS_2);
LNS_E_T_PRVS_3 := LNS_E [filter(DT_RFRNC = T_PRVS_3)];
CNTRPRTS_E_T_PRVS_3 := CNTRPRTS_E [filter(DT_RFRNC = T_PRVS_3)];
INSTRMNTS_CSTMRS_E_T_PRVS_3 := INSTRMNTS_CSTMRS_E [filter(DT_RFRNC = T_PRVS_3)];
INSTRMNTS_CRDTRS_E_T_PRVS_3 := INSTRMNTS_CRDTRS_E [filter(DT_RFRNC = T_PRVS_3)];
call CHCK_AC_RPRTNG_RQRMNTS(LNS_E_T_PRVS_3, INSTRMNTS_CSTMRS_E_T_PRVS_3, INSTRMNTS_CRDTRS_E_T_PRVS_3, CNTRPRTS_E_T_PRVS_3, TB_RPRTD_T_PRVS_3, INSTRMNTS_TB_RPRTD_T_PRVS_3);
INSTRMNTS_CSTMRS_E_T0 := INSTRMNTS_CSTMRS_E [filter(DT_RFRNC = T0)];

/*Creation of a data set of structure {Instrument unique identifier (INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID), To be reported t0 (TB_RPRTD_T0), To be reported t(-1) (TB_RPRTD_T_PRVS_1)}*/INSTRMNTS_TB_RPRTD := [INSTRMNTS_TB_RPRTD_T0, INSTRMNTS_TB_RPRTD_T_PRVS_1 on INSTRMNTS_UNQ_ID];

/*Creation of a data set of structure {Instrument unique identifier (INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID), To be reported t0 (TB_RPRTD_T0), To be reported t(-1) (TB_RPRTD_T_PRVS_1), To be reported t(-2) (TB_RPRTD_T_PRVS_2)}*/INSTRMNTS_TB_RPRTD := [INSTRMNTS_TB_RPRTD, INSTRMNTS_TB_RPRTD_T_PRVS_2 on INSTRMNTS_UNQ_ID];

/*Creation of a data set of structure {Instrument unique identifier (INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID), To be reported t0 (TB_RPRTD_T0), To be reported t(-1) (TB_RPRTD_T_PRVS_1), To be reported t(-2) (TB_RPRTD_T_PRVS_2), To be reported t(-3) (TB_RPRTD_T_PRVS_3)}*/INSTRMNTS_TB_RPRTD := [INSTRMNTS_TB_RPRTD, INSTRMNTS_TB_RPRTD_T_PRVS_2 on INSTRMNTS_UNQ_ID];

/*According to the AnaCredit manual, part I, section 5.2. Criteria triggering reporting as of a reporting reference date an instrument is required to be reported depends on the status of the instrument at different points in time. This transformation takes into account if an instrument qualifies to be reported at the latest four end-month dates*/INSTRMNTS_TB_RPRTD := INSTRMNTS_TB_RPRTD [calc (TB_RPRTD_T0 = "T" or TB_RPRTD_T_PRVS_1 = "T" or TB_RPRTD_T_PRVS_2 = "T" or TB_RPRTD_T_PRVS_3 = "T") as "TB_RPRTD"];
INSTRMNTS_CRDTRS_E_T0 := INSTRMNTS_CRDTRS_E [filter(DT_RFRNC = T0)];
call CHCK_AC_RPRTNG_RQRMNTS(LNS_E_T0, INSTRMNTS_CSTMRS_E_T0, INSTRMNTS_CRDTRS_E_T0, CNTRPRTS_E_T0, TB_RPRTD_T0, INSTRMNTS_TB_RPRTD_T0);
LNS_E_T_PRVS_1 := LNS_E [filter(DT_RFRNC = T_PRVS_1)];
CNTRPRTS_E_T_PRVS_1 := CNTRPRTS_E [filter(DT_RFRNC = T_PRVS_1)];
INSTRMNTS_CSTMRS_E_T_PRVS_1 := INSTRMNTS_CSTMRS_E [filter(DT_RFRNC = T_PRVS_1)];
INSTRMNTS_CRDTRS_E_T_PRVS_1 := INSTRMNTS_CRDTRS_E [filter(DT_RFRNC = T_PRVS_1)];
call CHCK_AC_RPRTNG_RQRMNTS(LNS_E_T_PRVS_1, INSTRMNTS_CSTMRS_E_T_PRVS_1, INSTRMNTS_CRDTRS_E_T_PRVS_1, CNTRPRTS_E_T_PRVS_1, TB_RPRTD_T_PRVS_1, INSTRMNTS_TB_RPRTD_T_PRVS_1);
INVSTMNT_PRPRTY_E := INVSTMNT_PRPRTY;
/*Creation of a dataset of structure {Counterparty identifier, Legal Entity Identifier}*/LEI_CDS := CNTRPRTS [keep(CNTRPRTY_ID, LEI)];
/*Adding the Counterparty identifier (CNTRPRTY_ID)*/LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_E := [LNS_ADVNCS_E as "A", INSTRMNTS_CSTMRS_E as "B" on INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID];
/*Adding information about the counterparty*/LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_E := [LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_E as "A", CNTRPRTS_E as "B" on CNTRPRTY_ID];
/*Derivation of the performing status*/LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_E := LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_E [calc D_PRFRMNG_STTS(APPRCH_CRDT_QLTY_STTS, CRDT_QLTY_STTS, CRDT_QLTY_STTS_CNTRPRTY, IMPRMNT_STTS) as "PRFRMNG_STTS"];
/*Adding the Counterparty identifier (CNTRPRTY_ID)*/LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_FINREP := [LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP as "A", INSTRMNTS_CSTMRS_E as "B" on INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID];
/*Adding information about the counterparty*/LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_FINREP := [LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_FINREP as "A", CNTRPRTS_FINREP as "B" on CNTRPRTY_ID];

/*For FinRep the secondary debtor(s) of an instrument is / are not considered, i.e. the main counterparty's characteristics are used for counterparty related breakdowns (e.g. performing / non-performing, institutional sector...)*/LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_FINREP [filter(JNT_LBLTY in ("0", "1"))];

/*Derivation of the performing status*/LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_FINREP [calc D_PRFRMNG_STTS(APPRCH_CRDT_QLTY_STTS, CRDT_QLTY_STTS, CRDT_QLTY_STTS_CNTRPRTY, IMPRMNT_STTS) as "PRFRMNG_STTS"];
LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP := [left LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_FINREP as "A", INSTRMNTS_PRTCTNS_E as "B" on INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID];
LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP := [LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP as "A", PRTCTNS_RCVD_FINREP as "B" on PRTCTN_ID];

/*Division of monetary value due to (possible) duplication of records w.r.t. protections (i.e. one instrument may be related to many protections)*/LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP[calc ACCMLTD_IMPRMN_NGTV_CHNG_FV_CR / NMBR_OF_PRTCTNS as "ACCMLTD_IMPRMN_NGTV_CHNG_FV_CR"];

/*Division of monetary value due to (possible) duplication of records w.r.t. protections (i.e. one instrument may be related to many protections)*/LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP[calc CRRYNG_AMNT / NMBR_OF_PRTCTNS as "CRRYNG_AMNT"];

/*Division of monetary value due to (possible) duplication of records w.r.t. protections (i.e. one instrument may be related to many protections)*/LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP[calc GRSS_CRRYNG_AMNT / NMBR_OF_PRTCTNS as "GRSS_CRRYNG_AMNT"];

/*Division of monetary value due to (possible) duplication of records w.r.t. protections (i.e. one instrument may be related to many protections)*/LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP[calc OTSTNDNG_NMNL_AMNT / NMBR_OF_PRTCTNS as "OTSTNDNG_NMNL_AMNT"];

/*Derivation of the Type of collateral or guarantee received that is used in F13.01*/LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP [calc D_TYP_CLLTRL_GRNT_RCVD1(TYP_PRTCTN, ISSR_ID) as "TYP_CLLTRL_GRNT_RCVD1"];

/*Derivation of the Type of collateral or guarantee received that is used in F18.00, F19.00*/LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP [calc D_TYP_CLLTRL_GRNT_RCVD2(TYP_PRTCTN, IS_CMMRCL_CLLTRL_FNNCL_GRNT, IS_RSTNTL_CLLTRL_FNNCL_GRNT) as "TYP_CLLTRL_GRNT_RCVD1"];
LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP[calc PRTCTN_CNSDRD_CPD_MX_AMT as "GRNT_MXMM_AMNT_CNSDRD"];
LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP[calc PRTCTN_CNSDRD_CPD_MX_AMT as "CLLTRL_MXMM_AMNT_GRNT_CNSDRD"];
LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP[calc PRTCTN_CNSDRD_CPD_MX_AMT as "CLLTRL_MXMM_AMNT_CNSDRD"];
/*Add the variable Number of protections (NMBR_OF_PRTCTNS)*/LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP := [LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP as "A",  PRTCTNS_PR_INSTRMNT as "B" on INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID];

/*Division of monetary value due to (possible) duplication of records w.r.t. protections (i.e. one instrument may be related to many protections)*/LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP[calc ACCMLTD_CHNG_NGTV_FV_CR / NMBR_OF_PRTCTNS as "ACCMLTD_CHNG_NGTV_FV_CR"];

/*Division of monetary value due to (possible) duplication of records w.r.t. protections (i.e. one instrument may be related to many protections)*/LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_PRTCTNS_FINREP[calc ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT / NMBR_OF_PRTCTNS as "ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT"];
/*Loans and advances comprises Loans - enriched (LNS_E) and Advances (that are not loans) - enriched (ADVNCS_E)*/LNS_ADVNCS_E := union(LNS_E, ADVNCS_NT_LNS_E);
/*Drop the carrying amount*/LNS_ADVNCS_E := LNS_ADVNCS_E [drop(CRRYNG_AMNT)];

/*Add the variable Carrying amount (CRRYNG_AMNT) that is either input or derived via the derivation rule*/LNS_ADVNCS_E := [LNS_ADVNCS_E as "A", D_CRRYNG_AMNT_LNS_ADVNCS as "B" on INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID] {keep(A.ALL_VARIABLES, B.CRRYNG_AMNT)};

/*Derivation of the Gross carrying amount w.r.t. FinRep*/LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_E [calc D_GRSS_CRRYNG_AMNT(ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN, CRRYNG_AMNT, ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT, ACCMLTD_CHNGS_FV_CR, CRDT_QLTY_STTS, IMPRMNT_STTS, ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT_GAAP1, ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT_GAAP2) as "GRSS_CRRYNG_AMNT"];

/*Derivation of the Accumulated negative changes in fair value due to credit risk w.r.t. FinRep*/LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP [calc D_ACCMLTD_NGTV_CHNGS_FV_CR (ACCMLTD_CHNGS_FV_CR) as "ACCMLTD_CHNG_NGTV_FV_CR"];

/*Reclassification of the variable Type of instrument (TYP_INSTRMNT) in order to comply with the FinRep output requirements*/LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP[calc D_TYP_INSTRMNT_ASSTS_FINREP(TYP_INSTRMNT, RPYMNT_RGHTS) as "TYP_INSTRMNT"];

/*Derivation of accounting classifications 'nGAAP: Non-trading non-derivative financial assets measured at fair value to equity. Subject to impairment (81)' and 'nGAAP: Non-trading non-derivative financial assets measured at fair value to equity. Not subject to impairment (82)'*/LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP[calc D_ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN_SBJCT_IMPRMNT(ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN, IMPRMNT_STTS) as "ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN"];
/*Adding the Fair value changes (FV_CHNG)*/LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP := [LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP as "A", LNS_ADVNCS_FVH as "B" on A.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID = B.ID];

/*Derivation of the Accumulated partial write-offs w.r.t. FinRep*/LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP [calc D_ACCMLTD_PRTL_WRTFFS(ACCMLTD_WRTFFS, CRRYNG_AMNT, ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT) as "ACCMLTD_PRTL_WRTFFS"];

/*Derivation of the Accumulated total write-offs w.r.t. FinRep*/LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP [calc D_ACCMLTD_TTL_WRTFFS(ACCMLTD_WRTFFS, CRRYNG_AMNT, ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT) as "ACCMLTD_TTL_WRTFFS"];
/*Derivation of the Time past due w.r.t. FinRep*/LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP [calc D_TM_PST_DU(DT_PST_D) as "TM_PST_DU"];
/*The Type of accounting item is set to 'Financial instrument.creditor (40)' by default*/LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP [calc "40" as "TYP_ACCNTNG_ITM"];
/*The Type of market is set to 'Not applicable (0)' by default*/LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP [calc "0" as "TYP_MRKT"];

/*Purchased credit-impaired (PRCHSD_ORGNTD) is equal to Purchased or originated credit impaired financial assets (PRCHSD_ORGNTD_CRDT_IMPRD) */LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP [calc PRCHSD_ORGNTD_CRDT_IMPRD as "PRCHSD_ORGNTD"];
/*Is short position (IS_SHRT_PSTN) is set to 'Not applicable (0)' by default*/LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP [calc "0" as "IS_SHRT_PSTN"];
LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP := LNS_ADVNCS_FINREP[calc D_ACCMLTD_IMPRMN_NGTV_CHNG_FV_CR(ACCMLTD_IMPRMNT, ACCMLTD_NGTV_CHNG_FV_CR, PRVSNS) as "ACCMLTD_IMPRMN_NGTV_CHNG_FV_CR"];

/*Instruments that are considered loans are put together in the cube Loans - enriched (LNS_E)*/
LNS_E := union(CRDT_CRD_DBT_E, FCTRNG_E, FNNCL_LSS_E, OTHR_DPSTS_E, OTHR_LNS_E, OTHR_TRD_RCVBLS_E, RVRS_RPRCHS_LNS_E, CRRNT_ACCNT_ASSTS_E);
/*Enrichment with instrument (related) information*/LNS_E := LNS_E [calc D_ELGBL_INSTRMNT_AC(TYP_INSTRMNT, OFF_BLNC_SHT_AMNT, OTSTNDNG_NMNL_AMNT, ACCMLTD_WRTFFS) as "IS_ELGBL_INSTRMNT_AC"]
MSTR_NTTNG_AGRMNT_E := MSTR_NTTNG_AGRMNT;

/*Selection of all master netting agreements where the Netting applicability (NTTNG_APPLCBLTY) is 'Accounting netting (1)' (i.e. that are relevant for FinRep)*/
MSTR_NTTNG_AGRMNT_FINREP := MSTR_NTTNG_AGRMNT_E [filter(NTTNG_APPLCBLTY in ("1"))];
MSTR_NTTNG_AGRMNT_FINREP := MSTR_NTTNG_AGRMNT_FINREP [keep(MSTR_NTTNG_AGRMNT_ID, MN_PSTN_ID)];
NN_FNNCL_ASSTS_E := NN_FNNCL_ASSTS;
NN_FNNCL_LBLTS_E := NN_FNNCL_LBLTS;
NN_FNNCL_LBLTS_FINREP := NN_FNNCL_LBLTS_E;
OTHR_ASSTS_E := OTHR_ASSTS;
OTHR_FNNCL_LBLTS_CSTMRS_FINREP := OTHR_FNNCL_LBLTS_FINREP[calc "0" as "INSTTTNL_SCTR"];
OTHR_FNNCL_LBLTS_NT_FNNCL_GRNTS_LN_CMMTMNTS_GVN_E := OTHR_FNNCL_LBLTS_NT_FNNCL_GRNTS_LN_CMMTMNTS_GVN;
OTHR_FNNCL_LBLTS_NT_FNNCL_GRNTS_LN_CMMTMNTS_GVN_FINREP := OTHR_FNNCL_LBLTS_NT_FNNCL_GRNTS_LN_CMMTMNTS_GVN_E;
OTHR_FNNCL_PRTCTN_E := OTHR_FNNCL_PRTCTN;

/*The variable Maximum amount of guarantee that can be considered for financial guarantees (FNNCL_GRNT_CNSDRD_MX_AMNT) for Other financial protection (OTHR_FNNCL_PRTCTN_E) is by default 'null'*/OTHR_FNNCL_PRTCTN_E := OTHR_FNNCL_PRTCTN_E [calc null as "FNNCL_GRNT_CNSDRD_MX_AMNT"];
/*The variable Issuer identifier (ISSR_ID) for Other financial protection (OTHR_FNNCL_PRTCTN) is by default 'null'*/OTHR_FNNCL_PRTCTN_E := OTHR_FNNCL_PRTCTN_E [calc null as "ISSR_ID"];
OTHR_INTNGBL_ASSTS_E := OTHR_INTNGBL_ASSTS;
OTHR_PHYSCL_PRTCTN_E := OTHR_PHYSCL_PRTCTN;

/*The variable Maximum amount of guarantee that can be considered for financial guarantees (FNNCL_GRNT_CNSDRD_MX_AMNT) for Other physical protection (OTHR_PHYSCL_PRTCTN) is by default 'null'*/OTHR_PHYSCL_PRTCTN_E := OTHR_PHYSCL_PRTCTN_E [calc null as "FNNCL_GRNT_CNSDRD_MX_AMNT"];
/*The variable Issuer identifier (ISSR_ID) for Other physical protection (OTHR_PHYSCL_PRTCTN) is by default 'null'*/OTHR_PHYSCL_PRTCTN_E := OTHR_PHYSCL_PRTCTN_E [calc null as "ISSR_ID"];
OTHR_PHYSCL_PRTCTN_E := OTHR_PHYSCL_PRTCTN_E [drop(SBTYP_PRTCTN)];

/*Enrich the cube Owned securities (OWND_SCRTS) with the information stored in the Registry table of securities (RGSTRY_TBL_SCRTS)*/
OWND_SCRTS_E := [OWND_SCRTS as "A", RGSTRY_TBL_SCRTS as "B" on SCRTY_ID];
OWND_SCRTS_E := OWND_SCRTS_E [drop(CRRYNG_AMNT)];

/*Add the carrying amount (that is either provided as an input or derived via the derivation rule*/
OWND_SCRTS_E := [OWND_SCRTS as "A", D_CRRYNG_AMNT_SCRTS as "B" on SCRTY_ID] {keep(A.ALL_VARIABLES, B.CRRYNG_AMNT)};
PL_ITM_E := PL_ITM;

/*The variable Maximum amount of guarantee that can be considered for financial guarantees (FNNCL_GRNT_CNSDRD_MX_AMNT) for Pool of (repo) items (PL_ITM) is by default 'null'*/PL_ITM_E := PL_ITM_E [calc null as "FNNCL_GRNT_CNSDRD_MX_AMNT"];
/*The variable Issuer identifier (ISSR_ID) for Pool of (repo) items (PL_ITM) is by default 'null'*/PL_ITM_E := PL_ITM_E [calc null as "ISSR_ID"];

/*Entities that are considered in the 'Prudential scope of consolidation (1)'*/PRDNTL_CNSLDTN_SCP_FINREP := GRP_FINREP [filter (GRP_ID = INSTTTN_ID and TYP_PRDNTL_CNSLDTN in ("3", "4") and CNSLDTN_SCP in ("1"))];
PRDNTL_CNSLDTN_SCP_FINREP_IDS := PRDNTL_CNSLDTN_SCP_FINREP[keep(LGL_ENTTY_ID)];

/*Identification of entities that are in the prudential scope (i.e. 'Prudential scope of consolidation (1)' only)*/CNSLDTD_ENTTS_PRDTNL := GRP_FINREP [filter (GRP_ID = CNSTNT_GRP_PRDNTL_ID and CNSLDTN_SCP in ("1"))];
CNSLDTD_ENTTS_PRDTNL_LST := CNSLDTD_ENTTS_PRDTNL [keep(LGL_ENTTY_ID)];
/*We denote the current date by T_CRRNT*/T_CRRNT := PRMTRS.DT_RFRNC;
/*We denote the staring date of the accounting year by T0 */T0 := PRMTRS.DT_ACCNTNG_YR
/*The Perspective identifier (PRSPCTV_ID) is set to the Institution identifier (INSTTTNL_ID)*/CNSTNT_PRSPCTV_ID := INSTTTNL_ID
/*Assigning the identifier for the accounting group*/CNSTNT_GRP_ACCNTNG_ID := GRP_ACCNTNG_ID
/*Assigning the identifier for the prudential group*/CNSTNT_GRP_PRDNTL_ID:= GRP_PRDNTL_ID
PRPRTY_PLNT_EQPMNT_E := PRPRTY_PLNT_EQPMNT;

/*Extract all Perspective identifiers of the entities that are present in the Accounting group with the Accounting framework similar to the one of the group; i.e. extract all identifiers that allow us to extract the values from an individual perspective based on the group accounting framework*/PRDNTL_NT_FLL_PRPTNL_CNSLDT_PRSPCTV_IDS := PRSPCTV_INF [filter(CNTRPRTY_ID in (CNSLDTD_ENTTS_ACCNTNG_LST) and ACCNTNG_FRMWRK = CNSTNT_ACCNTNG_FRMWRK_CNS)];
PRTCTNS_RL_ESTT_E := [RL_ESTT_PRTCTN_CLM as "A", RL_ESTT_CLM as "B" on PRTCTN_ID];
PRTCTNS_RL_ESTT_E := [PRTCTNS_RL_ESTT_E as "A", RL_ESTT_PRTCTN as "B" on PRTCTN_ITM_ID];

/*Protections that are not real estate (PRTCTNS_NT_RL_ESTT_E) comprise Securities protections - enriched (SCRTS_PRTCTN_E), Other physical protection - enriched (OTHR_PHYSCL_PRTCTN_E), Other financial protection - enriched (OTHR_PHYSCL_PRTCTN_E) and Pool of (repo) items - enriched (PL_ITM_E)*/PRTCTNS_NT_RL_ESTT_E := union (SCRTS_PRTCTN_E, OTHR_PHYSCL_PRTCTN_E, OTHR_FNNCL_PRTCTN_E, PL_ITM_E);

/*Generate a structure {Commitment unique identifier, #(Protection identifier)} where we assume that the second variable is named Number of protections (NMBR_OF_PRTCTNS)*/PRTCTNS_PR_CMMTMNT := count(CMMTMNTS_GVN_CSTMRS_RLTNSHP_E.PRTCTN_ID) group by (CMMTMNT_UNQ_ID);
/*Extract the Commitment unique identifiers (CMMTMNT_UNQ_ID) of all commitments given*/CMMTMNT_IDS := CMMTMNTS_GVN_FINREP [keep(CMMTMNT_UNQ_ID)];

/*Extract the Commitment unique identifiers (CMMTMNT_UNQ_ID) of all commitments given where there exists a related protection*/CMMTMNT_IDS_RLTD_PRTCTN := CMMTMNTS_GVN_PRTCTNS_E [keep(CMMTMNT_UNQ_ID)];
/*Identification of all commitments given where there does not exist a related protection*/NO_RLTD_PRTCTN := setdiff(CMMTMNT_IDS, CMMTMNT_IDS_RLTD_PRTCTN);
/*Set the Number of protections (NMBR_OF_PRTCTNS) to 1 (because we are going to divide the monetary values by this number)*/NO_RLTD_PRTCTN := NO_RLTD_PRTCTN [calc 1 as "NMBR_OF_PRTCTNS"];
/*Create a data set of structure {Commitment unique identifier, #(Protection identifier)} for all commitments given*/PRTCTNS_PR_CMMTMNT := union(PRTCTNS_PR_CMMTMNT, NO_RLTD_PRTCTN);

/*Generate a structure {Instrument unique identifier, #(Protection identifier)} where we assume that the second variable is named Number of protections (NMBR_OF_PRTCTNS)*/PRTCTNS_PR_INSTRMNT := count(INSTRMNTS_PRTCTNS.PRTCTN_ID) group by (INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID);
/*Extract the Instrument unique identifiers (INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID) of all loans and advances*/INSTRMNT_IDS_LNS_ADVNCS := LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_FINREP [keep(INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID)];

/*Extract the Instrument unique identifiers (INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID) of all loans and advances where there exists a related protection*/INSTRMNT_IDS_LNS_ADVNCS_PRTCTNS := INSTRMNTS_PRTCTNS_E [keep(INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID)];
/*Identification of all loans and advances where there does not exist a related protection*/NO_RLTD_PRTCTN := setdiff(INSTRMNT_IDS_LNS_ADVNCS, INSTRMNT_IDS_LNS_ADVNCS_PRTCTNS);
/*Set the Number of protections (NMBR_OF_PRTCTNS) to 1 (because we are going to divide the monetary values by this number)*/NO_RLTD_PRTCTN := NO_RLTD_PRTCTN [calc 1 as "NMBR_OF_PRTCTNS"];
/*Create a data set of structure {Instrument unique identifier, #(Protection identifier)} for all loans and advances*/PRTCTNS_PR_INSTRMNT_E := union(PRTCTNS_PR_INSTRMNT, NO_RLTD_PRTCTN);

/*The relations between Instruments and counterparties that are protection providers for protection other than real estate is extracted from the cue Transactions-counterparties (TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS) where the Type of transaction (TYP_TRNSCTN) is 'Protection received other than real estate (3)' and the Counterparty role in a transaction (CNTRPRTY_RL) is 'Protection provider (4)'*/PRTCTNS_PRTCTN_PRVDRS_E_1 := TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS [filter(TYP_TRNSCTN in ("3") and CNTRPRTY_RL in ("4"))]
PRTCTNS_PRTCTN_PRVDRS_E_1 := PRTCTNS_PRTCTN_PRVDRS_E_1 [keep(TRNSCTN_ID as "PRTCTN_ID", CNTRPRTY_ID, IS_PRMRY_PRTCTN_PRVDR)];

/*The relations between Instruments and counterparties that are protection providers for real estate protection is extracted from the cue Transactions-counterparties (TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS) where the Type of transaction (TYP_TRNSCTN) is 'Real estate protection (6)' and the Counterparty role in a transaction (CNTRPRTY_RL) is 'Protection provider (4)'*/PRTCTNS_PRTCTN_PRVDRS_E_2 := TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS [filter(TYP_TRNSCTN in ("6") and CNTRPRTY_RL in ("4"))]
PRTCTNS_PRTCTN_PRVDRS_E_2 := PRTCTNS_PRTCTN_PRVDRS_E_2 [keep(TRNSCTN_ID as "PRTCTN_ID", CNTRPRTY_ID, IS_PRMRY_PRTCTN_PRVDR)];
PRTCTNS_PRTCTN_PRVDRS_E := union(PRTCTNS_PRTCTN_PRVDRS_E_1, PRTCTNS_PRTCTN_PRVDRS_E_2);
PRTCTNS_NT_RL_ESTT_FINREP := PRTCTNS_NT_RL_ESTT_E [keep(PRTCTN_ID, TYP_PRTCTN, FNNCL_GRNT_CNSDRD_MX_AMNT)];
PRTCTNS_RL_ESTT_FINREP := PRTCTNS_RL_ESTT_E [keep(PRTCTN_ID, TYP_PRTCTN)];
PRTCTNS_RL_ESTT_FINREP := PRTCTNS_RL_ESTT_FINREP [calc null as "FNNCL_GRNT_CNSDRD_MX_AMNT"];
PRTCTNS_RCVD_FINREP := union(PRTCTNS_NT_RL_ESTT_FINREP, PRTCTNS_RL_ESTT_FINREP);
/*Create a subset of structure {Protection identifier, Type of protection}*/PRTCTNS_RCVD_FINREP_SUB := PRTCTNS_RCVD_FINREP [keep(PRTCTN_ID, TYP_PRTCTN)];

/*Evaluate each protection in order to derive a structure like {Protection identifier, Is residential collateral and financial guarantee, Is commercial collateral and financial guarantee}*/call EVLT_TYP_CLLTRL_GRNT(PRTCTNS_RCVD_FINREP_SUB, PRTCTN_ID, PRTCTNS_RCVD_FINREP_SUB);

PRTCTNS_RCVD_FINREP := [PRTCTNS_RCVD_FINREP as "A", PRTCTNS_RCVD_FINREP_SUB as "B" on PRTCTN_ID] {keep(A.PRTCTN_ID, A.FNNCL_GRNT_CNSDRD_MX_AMNT, A.TYP_PRTCTN, B.IS_RSTNTL_CLLTRL_FNNCL_GRNT, B.IS_CMMRCL_CLLTRL_FNNCL_GRNT)};
RPRCHS_AGRMNT_LNS_E := RPRCHS_AGRMNT_LNS;
RPRCHS_AGRMNT_LNS_FINREP := RPRCHS_AGRMNT_LNS_E;
RPRCHS_AGRMNT_SCRTS_E := RPRCHS_AGRMNT_SCRTS;
RPRCHS_AGRMNT_SCRTS_FINREP := RPRCHS_AGRMNT_SCRTS_E;

/*Extract all loans and advances that are part of a repurchase agreement*/LNS_RPRCHS_AGRMNT_FINREP := [LNS_ADVNCS_DBTRS_FINREP as "A", RPRCHS_AGRMNT_LNS_FINREP as "B" on A.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID = B.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID_LN];
LNS_RPRCHS_AGRMNT_FINREP := LNS_RPRCHS_AGRMNT_FINREP [rename CRRYNG_AMNT as "ASST_CRRYNG_AMNT"];
RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP := RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP [rename TYP_ACCTNG_ITM as "TYP_ACCTNG_ITM_ASST"];

/*Add information about the related Repurchase agreements (that are comprised in the cube Deposits (that are liabilities) (FinRep) (DPSTS_THT_LBLTS_CSTMRS_FINREP)) */RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP := [RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP as "A", DPSTS_THT_LBLTS_CSTMRS_FINREP as "B" on INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID];
RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP := RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP [rename CRRYNG_AMNT as "LBLTY_CRRYNG_AMNT"];
RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP := RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP [rename INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID as "LBLTY_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID"];
RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP := RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP [rename TYP_ACCTNG_ITM as "TYP_ACCTNG_ITM_LBLTY"];
/*The Type of risk transfer (TYP_RSK_TRNSFR) is set to 'Repurchase agreements (5)'*/RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP := RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP [calc "5" as "TYP_RSK_TRNSFR"];

/*The Type of activity of Related parties/Relationships (TYP_ACTVTY_RLTD_PRTS) for recognised instruments is set to 'Not applicable (0)' by default*/RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP := RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP [calc "0" as "TYP_ACTVTY_RLTD_PRTS"];

/*The Treatment of securitised/transferred assets in balance sheet (TRTMNT_TRNSFRRD_ASSTS_BLNC_SHT) for instruments subject to repurchase agreements is set to 'Entirely recognised (1)' by default*/RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP := RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP [calc "1" as "TRTMNT_TRNSFRRD_ASSTS_BLNC_SHT"];

/*The Amounts derecognised for capital purposes (AMNT_DRCGNSD_CPTL_PRPS) is set to 'null' due to the fact that we consider Repurchase agreements to be considered in the balance*/RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP := RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP [calc "null" as "AMNT_DRCGNSD_CPTL_PRPS"];

/*Generate a structure {Liability instrument unqiue identifier, #(Asset instrument unqiue identifier)}*/NMBR_ASSTS_LBLTS := count(RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP.ASST_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID) group by (LBLTY_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID);
LNS_RPRCHS_AGRMNT_FINREP := LNS_RPRCHS_AGRMNT_FINREP [rename INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID_LN as "ASST_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID"];

/*Generate a structure {Asset instrument unqiue identifier, #(Liability instrument unqiue identifier)}*/NMBR_LBLTS_ASSTS := count(RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP.LBLTY_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID) group by (ASST_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID);

/*Adding the Number of assets per liability (NMBR_ASSTS_PR_LBLTY) for each liability*/ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP := [RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP as "A", NMBR_ASSTS_LBLTS as "B" on LBLTY_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID];

/*Adding the Number of liabilities per asset (NMBR_LBLTS_PR_ASST) for each asset*/ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP := [RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP as "A", NMBR_LBLTS_ASSTS as "B" on ASST_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID];

/*Divide the Asset carrying amount (ASST_CRRYNG_AMNT) by the Number of liablities per asset (NMBR_LBLTS_PR_ASST) in order to avoid double counting*/RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP := RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP [calc (ASST_CRRYNG_AMNT / NMBR_LBLTS_PR_ASST) as "ASST_CRRYNG_AMNT"];

/*Divide the Outstanding nominal amount (OTSTNDNG_NMNL_AMNT) by the Number of liablities per asset (NMBR_LBLTS_PR_ASST) in order to avoid double counting*/RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP := RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP [calc (OTSTNDNG_NMNL_AMNT / NMBR_LBLTS_PR_ASST) as "OTSTNDNG_NMNL_AMNT"];

/*Divide the Liability carrying amount (LBLTY_CRRYNG_AMNT) by the Number of assets per liability (NMBR_ASSTS_PR_LBLTY) in order to avoid double counting*/RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP := RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP [calc (LBLTY_CRRYNG_AMNT / NMBR_ASSTS_PR_LBLTY) as "LBLTY_CRRYNG_AMNT"];

/*Generation of a set that comprises all information that is required in order to derive Derecognition and financial liabilities associated with transferred financial assets: Equity instruments, debt securities, loans and advances - Reference (unfolded) (F_15_00_a_REF_UNFLDD) and Derecognition and financial liabilities associated with transferred financial assets: Derivatives, Deposits, Debt securities issued, Other financial liabilities - Reference (unfolded)*/RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP := RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP [keep(PRSPCTV_ID, DT_RFRNC, ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN, OBSRVD_AGNT_INTRNL_ID, TRTMNT_TRNSFRRD_ASSTS_BLNC_SHT, TYP_RSK_TRNSFR, ASST_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID, LBLTY_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID, ASST_CRRYNG_AMNT, OTSTNDNG_NMNL_AMNT, AMNT_DRCGNSD_CPTL_PRPS, LBLTY_CRRYNG_AMNT, TYP_ACCNTNG_ITM_ASST, TYP_ACCNTNG_ITM_LBLTY)];

/*Extract all debt securities that are part of a repurchase agreement*/DBT_SCRTS_DBTRS_RPRCHS_AGRMNT_FINREP := [DBT_SCRTS_DBTRS_FINREP as "A", RPRCHS_AGRMNT_SCRTS as "B" on A.OWND_SCRTY_ID = B.OWND_SCRTY_ID];
DBT_SCRTS_DBTRS_RPRCHS_AGRMNT_FINREP := DBT_SCRTS_DBTRS_RPRCHS_AGRMNT_FINREP [rename OWND_SCRTY_ID as "LBLTY_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID"];
DBT_SCRTS_DBTRS_RPRCHS_AGRMNT_FINREP := DBT_SCRTS_DBTRS_RPRCHS_AGRMNT_FINREP [rename CRRYNG_AMNT as "ASST_CRRYNG_AMNT"];

/*Extract all equity instruments that are part of a repurchase agreement*/EQTY_DBTRS_RPRCHS_AGRMNT_FINREP := [EQTY_INSTRMNTS_DBTRS_FINREP as "A", RPRCHS_AGRMNT_SCRTS as "B" on A.OWND_SCRTY_ID = B.OWND_SCRTY_ID];
EQTY_DBTRS_RPRCHS_AGRMNT_FINREP := EQTY_DBTRS_RPRCHS_AGRMNT_FINREP [rename OWND_SCRTY_ID as "LBLTY_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID"];
EQTY_DBTRS_RPRCHS_AGRMNT_FINREP := EQTY_DBTRS_RPRCHS_AGRMNT_FINREP [rename CRRYNG_AMNT as "ASST_CRRYNG_AMNT"];
RPRCHS_AGRMNTS_SCRTSTN_FINREP := union(LNS_RPRCHS_AGRMNT_FINREP, DBT_SCRTS_DBTRS_RPRCHS_AGRMNT_FINREP, EQTY_DBTRS_RPRCHS_AGRMNT_FINREP);

/*Identification of entities that are (i) considered 'Subsidiaries (3)', 'Associates (4)' or 'Joint ventures in which the entity is a joint venturer (5)' and that are (ii) consolidated using the 'Equity method (3)' or 'Other than Full consolidation, Proportional consolidation, Equity method (4)' (i.e. not fully or proportionally consolidated) and that are in the accounting scope (i.e. 'Prudential scope of consolidation (1)', 'Accounting scope of consolidation but not in the prudential scope (2)')*/SBSDRS_ASSCTS_JNT_VNTRS_GRP_FINREP := GRP_FINREP [filter (GRP_ID = INSTTTN_ID and GRP_STRCTR_RLTNSHP in ("3", "4", "5") and TYP_PRDNTL_CNSLDTN in ("3", "4") and CNSLDTN_SCP in ("1", "2"))];

/*Generate a (flat) set of Counterparty identifiers (CNTRPRTY_ID) for all entities that are considered as 'Subsidiaries (3)', 'Associates (4)' or 'Joint ventures in which the entity is a joint venturer (5)'*/SBSDRS_ASSCTS_JNT_VNTRS_IDS := SBSDRS_ASSCTS_JNT_VNTRS_GRP_FINREP [keep(LGL_ENTTY_ID)];

/*Enrichment of the cube Securities issued (SCRTS_ISSD) with the information comprised in the cube Registry table of securities (RGSTRY_TBL_SCRTS)*/SCRTS_ISSD_E := [SCRTS_ISSD as "A", RGSTRY_TBL_SCRTS as "B" on SCRTY_ID];
SCRTS_PRTCTN_E := [SCRTS_PRTCTN as "A", RGSTRY_TBL_SCRTS as "B" on SCRTY_ID];

/*The variable Maximum amount of guarantee that can be considered for financial guarantees (FNNCL_GRNT_CNSDRD_MX_AMNT) for Securities protections is by default 'null'*/SCRTS_PRTCTN_E := SCRTS_PRTCTN_E [calc null as "FNNCL_GRNT_CNSDRD_MX_AMNT"];

SCRTS_PRTCTN_E := SCRTS_PRTCTN_E [keep(PRTCTN_ID, DT_RFRNC, PRSPCTV_ID, DT_MTRTY_PRTCTN, DT_ORGNL_PRTCTN_VL, DT_PRTCTN_VLTN, FNNCL_GRNT_CNSDRD_MX_AMNT, OBSRVD_AGNT_INTRNL_ID, ORGNL_PRTCTN_VL, PRTCTN_VL, PRTCTN_VLTN_APPRCH, TYP_PRTCTN, TYP_PRTCTN_VL, ISSR_ID)];

/*The relations between securitisations and servicers is extracted from the cue Transactions-counterparties (TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS) where the Type of transaction (TYP_TRNSCTN) is 'Securitisation/Transfer (4)' and the Counterparty role in a transaction (CNTRPRTY_RL) is 'Originator (3)'*/SCRTSTNS_ORGNTRS_E := TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS [filter(TYP_TRNSCTN in ("4") and CNTRPRTY_RL in ("3"))];
/*Keeping only relevant variables*/SCRTSTNS_ORGNTRS_E := SCRTSTNS_ORGNTRS_E [keep(TRNSCTN_ID as "SCRTSTN_TRNSFR_ID", CNTRPRTY_ID)];
SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_E := SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS;
SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP := SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_E;

/*Join Securitisations and other credit transfers (FinRep) (SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP) with Asset instruments (ASST_INSTRMNTS)*/ASSTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP := [left SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP as "A", ASST_INSTRMNTS as "B" on SCRTSTN_TRNSFR_ID];

/*Rename the Instrument unique identifier (INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID) to Asset instrument unqiue identifier (ASST_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID)*/ASSTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP := ASSTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP [rename INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID as "ASST_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID"];

/*Divide the Asset carrying amount (ASST_CRRYNG_AMNT) by the Number of liablities per asset (NMBR_LBLTS_PR_ASST) in order to avoid double counting*/ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP := ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP [calc (ASST_CRRYNG_AMNT / NMBR_LBLTS_PR_ASST) as "ASST_CRRYNG_AMNT"];

/*Divide the Outstanding nominal amount (OTSTNDNG_NMNL_AMNT) by the Number of liablities per asset (NMBR_LBLTS_PR_ASST) in order to avoid double counting*/ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP := ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP [calc (OTSTNDNG_NMNL_AMNT / NMBR_LBLTS_PR_ASST) as "OTSTNDNG_NMNL_AMNT"];

/*Divide the Liability carrying amount (LBLTY_CRRYNG_AMNT) by the Number of assets per liability (NMBR_ASSTS_PR_LBLTY) in order to avoid double counting*/ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP := ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP [calc (LBLTY_CRRYNG_AMNT / NMBR_ASSTS_PR_LBLTY) as "LBLTY_CRRYNG_AMNT"];

/*Derivation of  Amounts derecognised for capital purposes (AMNT_DRCGNSD_CPTL_PRPS)*/ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP := ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP [calc if (SGNFCNT_RSK_TRNSFR = "T") then ASST_CRRYNG_AMNT else 0 as "AMNT_DRCGNSD_CPTL_PRPS"];

/*Generation of a set that comprises all information that is required in order to derive Derecognition and financial liabilities associated with transferred financial assets: Equity instruments, debt securities, loans and advances - Reference (unfolded) (F_15_00_a_REF_UNFLDD) and Derecognition and financial liabilities associated with transferred financial assets: Derivatives, Deposits, Debt securities issued, Other financial liabilities - Reference (unfolded)*/ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP := ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP [keep(SCRTSTN_TRNSFR_ID, PRSPCTV_ID, DT_RFRNC, ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN, OBSRVD_AGNT_INTRNL_ID, TRTMNT_TRNSFRRD_ASSTS_BLNC_SHT, TYP_RSK_TRNSFR, ASST_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID, LBLTY_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID, ASST_CRRYNG_AMNT, OTSTNDNG_NMNL_AMNT, AMNT_DRCGNSD_CPTL_PRPS, LBLTY_CRRYNG_AMNT, ASST_TYP_ACCNTNG_ITM, LBLTY_TYP_ACCNTNG_ITM)];

/*The Type of activity of Related parties/Relationships (TYP_ACTVTY_RLTD_PRTS) for recognised instruments is 'Not applicable (0)' for recognised instruments, for derecognised instruments it's 'Loan servicing activities (6)'*/ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP := ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP[calc if (TRTMNT_TRNSFRRD_ASSTS_BLNC_SHT = "3") then "6" else "0" as "TYP_ACTVTY_RLTD_PRTS"];

/*Application of a hierarchy on the Type of risk transfer (TYP_RSK_TRNSFR), i.e. ('Traditional securitisation (1)', 'Other transfer (3)') -> ('Securitization (4)')*/ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP := transcode(ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP, TYP_RSK_TRNSFR_flat_hier_FINREP, TYP_RSK_TRNSFR);

/*Rename the Carrying amount (CRRYNG_AMNT) to Asset carrying amount (ASST_CRRYNG_AMNT)*/ASSTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP := ASSTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP [rename CRRYNG_AMNT as "ASST_CRRYNG_AMNT"];

/*Join Securitisations and other credit transfers (FinRep) (SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP) with Liabilities instruments (LBLTY_INSTRMNTS)*/ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP := [left ASSTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP as "A", LBLTY_INSTRMNTS as "B" on SCRTSTN_TRNSFR_ID];

/*Rename the Instrument unque identifier (INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID) to Libility instrument unqiue identifier (LBLTY_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID)*/ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP := ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP [rename INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID as "LBLTY_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID"];

/*Rename the Carrying amount (CRRYNG_AMNT) to Liability carrying amount (LBLTY_CRRYNG_AMNT)*/ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP := ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP [rename CRRYNG_AMNT as "LBLTY_CRRYNG_AMNT"];

/*Generate a structure {Liability instrument unqiue identifier, #(Asset instrument unqiue identifier)}*/NMBR_ASSTS_LBLTS := count(ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP.ASST_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID) group by (LBLTY_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID);

/*Generate a structure {Asset instrument unqiue identifier, #(Liability instrument unqiue identifier)}*/NMBR_LBLTS_ASSTS := count(ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP.LBLTY_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID) group by (ASST_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID);

/*Adding the Number of assets per liability (NMBR_ASSTS_PR_LBLTY) for each liability*/ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP := [ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP as "A", NMBR_ASSTS_LBLTS as "B" on LBLTY_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID];

/*Adding the Number of liabilities per asset (NMBR_LBLTS_PR_ASST) for each asset*/ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP := [ASSTS_LBLTS_SCRTSTNS_OTHR_CRDT_TRNSFRS_FINREP as "A", NMBR_LBLTS_ASSTS as "B" on ASST_INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID];

/*The relations between securitisations and servicers is extracted from the cue Transactions-counterparties (TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS) where the Type of transaction (TYP_TRNSCTN) is 'Securitisation/Transfer (4)' and the Counterparty role in a transaction (CNTRPRTY_RL) is 'Servicer (3)'*/SCRTSTNS_SRVCRS_E := TRNSCTNS_CNTRPRTS [filter(TYP_TRNSCTN in ("4") and CNTRPRTY_RL in ("3"))];
/*Keeping only relevant variables*/SCRTSTNS_SRVCRS_E := SCRTSTNS_SRVCRS_E [keep(TRNSCTN_ID as "SCRTSTN_TRNSFR_ID", CNTRPRTY_ID)];
/*Adding the Counterparty identifier (CNTRPRTY_ID)*/SHRT_PSTNS_CSTMRS_FINREP := [SHRT_PSTNS_FINREP as "A", INSTRMNTS_CSTMRS_E as "B" on A.OWND_SCRTY_ID = B.INSTRMNT_UNQ_ID]
/*Adding information about the counterparty (e.g. Institutional sector (INSTTTNL_SCTR)*/SHRT_PSTNS_CSTMRS_FINREP := [SHRT_PSTNS_CSTMRS_FINREP as "A", CNTRPRTS_FINREP as "B" on CNTRPRTY_ID];
/*Extraction of short positions*/SHRT_PSTNS_E := OWND_SCRTS_E [filter(IS_SHRT_PSTN in ("T"))];

/*Please note that the variables acting as operands for the keep operator are defined by the output requirements of the unfolded FinRep reference cubes*/
SHRT_PSTNS_FINREP := SHRT_PSTNS_E;
/*Adding the Fair value changes in the periode (FV_CHNG)*/SHRT_PSTNS_FINREP := [SHRT_PSTNS_FINREP as "A", SHRT_PSTNS_FVH as "B" on A.PSTN_ID = B.ID];

/*Extraction of the Type of prudential consolidation (TYP_PRDNTL_CNSLDTN) per Counterparty (LGL_ENTTY_ID) in the Accounting group*/ACCNTNG_CNSLDTN_CNTRPRTY_FINREP := CNSLDTD_ENTTS_ACCNTNG [keep(LGL_ENTTY_ID, TYP_PRDNTL_CNSLDTN)];

/*Renaming the variable Type of prudential consolidation (TYP_PRDNTL_CNSLDTN) into Type of accounting consolidation (TYP_ACCNTNG_CNSLDTN)*/ACCNTNG_CNSLDTN_CNTRPRTY_FINREP := ACCNTNG_CNSLDTN_CNTRPRTY_FINREP [rename TYP_PRDNTL_CNSLDTN as "TYP_ACCNTNG_CNSLDTN"];

/*Extraction of the Type of prudential consolidation (TYP_PRDNTL_CNSLDTN) per Counterparty (LGL_ENTTY_ID) in the Prudential group*/PRDTNL_CNSLDTN_CNTRPRTY_FINREP := CNSLDTD_ENTTS_PRDTNL [keep(LGL_ENTTY_ID, TYP_PRDNTL_CNSLDTN)];
TYP_CNSLDTN_CNTRPRTY_FINREP := [left ACCNTNG_CNSLDTN_CNTRPRTY_FINREP as "A", PRDTNL_CNSLDTN_CNTRPRTY_FINREP as "B" on LGL_ENTTY_ID];
